last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Lesson! Impact Inherited
last_episode_to_air.overview: Avalo Pizarro, who merged with the Pirate Island, reaches his giant hand to crush the Navy ship with many soldiers and civilians on board. The wounded Garp gives orders to Koby, Helmeppo, and Prince Grus, and delivers a powerful blow to save the ship.

name: One Piece
overview:
Years ago, the fearsome Pirate King, Gol D. Roger was executed leaving a huge pile of treasure and the famous "One Piece" behind. Whoever claims the "One Piece" will be named the new King of the Pirates.

Monkey D. Luffy, a boy who consumed a "Devil Fruit," decides to follow in the footsteps of his idol, the pirate Shanks, and find the One Piece. It helps, of course, that his body has the properties of rubber and that he's surrounded by a bevy of skilled fighters and thieves to help him along the way.

Luffy will do anything to get the One Piece and become King of the Pirates!

seasons.name: East Blue
seasons.overview: Monkey D. Luffy meets the Red Hair Pirates as a young boy living in East Blue, swearing becoming the next Pirate King. 10 years later, Luffy sets sail and experiences first adventures, recruiting the first members of the Straw Hat Pirates.

seasons.name: Whisky Peak & Little Garden
seasons.overview:
With a Log Pose now in hand, the Straw Hat Pirates are directed toward Whisky Peak, a town that welcomes pirates with open arms and treats them like celebrities. However, the townsfolk have a dark secret, and an even deeper mystery awaits.

Now with Vivi in tow, the Straw Hat Pirates travel to the prehistoric island of Little Garden. There, they encounter two Giants, Dorry and Brogy, who have been dueling one another on the island for the past century. After befriending the giants, the crew are ambushed by new and familiar officers of Baroque Works.

seasons.name: Drum Island
seasons.overview: After Nami falls ill with an unknown disease, the Straw Hat Pirates travel to Drum Island in search of a doctor. The crew meets a bizarre talking reindeer named Tony Tony Chopper, who helps them fend off the country's former despot king Wapol after he returns to reclaim his throne.

seasons.name: Alabasta
seasons.overview: The Straw Hats, with Kureha's assistant Tony Tony Chopper, finally arrive at Arabasta, which is on the verge of civil war. Vivi must reach the rebels and tell them the real cause behind the conflict, but Crocodile, leader of Baroque Works and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, will not just stand by and watch. In the end, Baroque Works, marine forces, pirates, the royal guards, and the rebel army clash in a battle that will determine the fate of the country itself.

seasons.name: Post-Alabasta, Goat Island & Ruluka Island
seasons.overview: While on the run from some Marines, the crew stumble upon an island inhabited by a man named Zenny who lives with a herd of goats. The crew set out to him in his seemingly final days. After evading some Marines, the crew stop off in a small town with a huge tower, which is also being oppressed by the Mayor whose overtaxing the citizens. But a bigger concern is a nearby mist that prevents anyone who enters it from leaving.

seasons.name: Skypiea
seasons.overview: The Straw Hats arrive on the Sky Island Skypiea and learn of its connections to Jaya and Mont Blanc Noland's tale of a lost city of gold. As the crew embarks in search of treasure, they become entangled in a three-way war between the native Skypieans, the vengeful Shandians, and the land's cruel "god", Enel.

seasons.name: Long Ring Long Land
seasons.overview:
The Straw Hats accidentally float down into the Marine base, G-8. Forced to abandon ship, the crew must make their way through the base to reclaim the Going Merry and avoid capture.

The crew manage to safely reach their next island, Long Ring Long Land. They meet a nomad who's been stuck on the island for a while and offer to help him. But before they can, they're challenged by a pirate who calls himself Foxy the Silver Fox in a game of "Davy Back Fight", where the losers can lose their crew members.

One night as the crew rest, a boy with a seahorse-shaped flute plays it near the ship. The next day the crew awaken with their memories of each other wiped out, except for Robin. It's up to her, who was the only one not affected, to get the crew's memories back and find out the cause of it.

The Straw Hat pirates later re-encounter Foxy, Porche, and Hamburg. This encounter leads to a fight, and also leads to the encounter with Aokiji.

seasons.name: Water Seven
seasons.overview: The Straw Hats arrive at the oceanic metropolis of Water 7 to find a shipwright who can repair the Going Merry, as well as potentially join their crew. They soon become targeted by the Franky Family, the city's underground gang, and become involved in a plot within the Galley-La Company. Between the disappearance of Robin and a schism that develops between Luffy and Usopp, the crew begins to fall apart.

seasons.name: Enies Lobby
seasons.overview: The Straw Hats, Sogeking, the Franky Family, and the shipwrights of the Galley-La Company arrive at Enies Lobby aboard the Rocketman to rescue Nico Robin and Franky. Standing in their way, however, are the forces of the World Government, including its deadly assassination unit, CP9. A massive battle ensues between the two sides when Luffy declares war against the World Government.

seasons.name: Thriller Bark
seasons.overview: During their journey through the Florian Triangle, the Straw Hats arrive on a seemingly haunted island called Thriller Bark, where they encounter the Warlord Gecko Moria. Using his Devil Fruit abilities, Moria steals the Straw Hats' shadows. With the help of a mysterious talking skeleton named Brook, the crew must regain their shadows before sunrise in order to survive.

seasons.name: Sabaody Archipelago
seasons.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the final island of the Grand Line's first half, Sabaody Archipelago. While searching for a means to pass under the Red Line into the New World, they come into conflict with a deadly slave trading ring that sells to the World Nobles. Luffy and Zoro are labelled as two of the Eleven Supernovas, rookies of significant bounties who have simultaneously arrived at the archipelago. A chain reaction of events engulfs the archipelago in chaos, and the Straw Hats are faced with their greatest challenge yet.

seasons.name: Amazon Lily
seasons.overview: After his defeat at the hands of Kuma at the Sabaody Archipelago, Luffy is sent flying and crash lands on Amazon Lily, an island exclusive to women that executes males on sight. As he tries to find a way off the island and back to his crew, Luffy makes unexpected friends and foes, while also learning of his brother's imminent peril.

seasons.name: Impel Down & Marineford
seasons.overview:
Luffy puts finding his crew on hold in favor of rescuing his brother Ace from the underwater prison Impel Down. With Boa Hancock's help, he manages to infiltrate the facility. However, fulfilling his objective and escaping the hellish prison might be easier said than done.

Having failed to reach Ace before he was transferred, Luffy and his companions escape from Impel Down and travel to Marineford, the base of Marine Headquarters. With the odds stacked high against him, the imminent threat of Whitebeard, and the ulterior motives of pirates that wish to overthrow the Emperor, Luffy struggles to hold his own in this titanic clash of powers.

seasons.name: Fishman Island
seasons.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates finally arrive at Fishman Island. There, the crew learn the history of Fisher Tiger and the ongoing discrimination between humans and fishman, while the New Fishman Pirates plot to overtake Ryugu Kingdom and make fishman be recognized as the supreme race.

seasons.name: Punk Hazard
seasons.overview: Upon finally entering the New World, the Straw Hat Pirates immediately receive a distress call from residents of Punk Hazard, who state that a samurai is attacking them. Without hesitation, Luffy sets out to the blazing island, with Vice Admiral Smoker hot on his tail. On the supposedly death-ridden and empty island, the Straw Hats soon must contend with both the G-5 Marines, led by Vice Admiral Smoker, and the mad scientist Caesar Clown, whose deadly experiments must be stopped.

seasons.name: Dressrosa
seasons.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates and Trafalgar Law, together with Kin'emon, Momonosuke and the captured Caesar Clown, travel to Dressrosa with the goal of taking down the nation's king, Warlord of the Sea Donquixote Doflamingo. However, they soon set into motion a series of world-changing events, as their actions interact unexpectedly with those of larger forces at play.

seasons.name: Dressrosa (2)
seasons.overview: A sequence of unexpected events shakes the world order, and Doflamingo proves to be a challenge that even some of the strongest warriors cannot overcome.

seasons.name: Zou
seasons.overview: After defeating Doflamingo, the Straw Hats, Trafalgar Law, Kin'emon, and Kanjuro arrive on Zou, in order to reunite with Sanji and the others. However, they discover that Sanji has been swept up in a set of personal and political entanglements and that Zou has been subjected to a siege by Jack of the Beasts Pirates.

seasons.name: Whole Cake Island
seasons.overview: Luffy, Nami, Chopper, Brook, and the minks Pekoms, Pedro, and Carrot head to Whole Cake Island, where Big Mom of the Four Emperors resides. Nicknamed the Sanji Retrieval Team, the group seeks to rescue their crewmate Sanji from his arranged marriage with Charlotte Pudding, set up to finalize a political alliance between the Charlotte Family and the Vinsmoke Family. However, during their operation, they become involved in a plot to assassinate Big Mom herself.

seasons.name: Levely Arc
seasons.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates' actions against the Big Mom Pirates are revealed to the world. Luffy's group is on its way to Wano Country while the Revolutionary Army prepares for their next move. Meanwhile, royalty across the globe gathers for the Levely, without knowing that a shadow-like figure is pulling the strings of the World.

seasons.name: Wano Country Arc
seasons.overview: The Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance gather their forces in Wano Country and prepare for their inevitable clash against the Beasts Pirates. The history of Kozuki Oden and his ties to Wano Country, Whitebeard and Gol D. Roger are revealed, and the Alliance assaults Onigashima to take down the allied forces of Kaidou and Big Mom once and for all. The resulting battle, as well as the events during the recent Levely, cause the world to go through dramatic changes.

seasons.name: Egghead
seasons.overview: The aftermaths of both the Levely and the Raid on Onigashima, as well as the erasure of the Lulusia Kingdom, cause major shifts across the world that could lead to global war. The Straw Hat Pirates, following their Log Pose, arrive at the mysterious, futuristic island Egghead where the super genius Dr. Vegapunk resides. However, after being tipped off about Vegapunk's research into the Void Century, the World Government decides to dispatch a CP0 team to assassinate Vegapunk. Betrayal and intrigue on all sides leads to a Marine siege on the island that will escalate into an incident that will shock the world.

episodes.name: I'm Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the Pirate King!
episodes.overview: A group of pirates lead by Alvida plunder a ship, only to find a barrel which contains a strange boy named Luffy. Luffy is on a mission to find the legendary treasure "One Piece" and he befriends the ship's cabin-boy, Coby, who actually wants to become a marine officer. Luffy defeats Alvida and the two journey on in search of crewmates.

episodes.name: The Great Swordsman Appears! Pirate Hunter, Roronoa Zoro
episodes.overview: Luffy and Coby arrive at Shell Island, a Marine base. They meet the bounty hunter Roronoa Zoro, held under arrest by the infamous marine, Captain Morgan, and his son Helmeppo.

episodes.name: Morgan VS Luffy! Who's This Beautiful Young Girl?
episodes.overview: Luffy convinces Zoro to join his crew, but they must first defeat Captain Morgan. After freeing the island from Morgan's oppressive rule, Coby is accepted as a marine while the other two continue on their journey.

episodes.name: Luffy's Past! The Red-haired Shanks appears
episodes.overview: Out on the sea, Luffy almost loses his hat and reflects on his past, and how a pirate named Shanks influenced him. Afterwards, Luffy meets Nami, and Buggy the Clown's men.

episodes.name: Fear, Mysterious Power! Pirate Clown Captain Buggy!
episodes.overview: In order to save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, Nami tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to Buggy.

episodes.name: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs Luffy!
episodes.overview: Mohji and Richie show up for revenge after Buggy's humiliating defeat in the previous episode, and Luffy meets a small dog guarding his master's store, even though he knows that he is long dead.

episodes.name: Grand Duel! Zoro the Swordsman vs Cabaji the Acrobat!
episodes.overview: Enraged by the actions of Buggy's crew, the city's mayor rushes to fight Buggy himself, but the Straw Hat Pirates come to his rescue. Zoro fights Cabaji, despite still being wounded from his previous encounter with Buggy, while Luffy faces the clown pirate himself and Nami searches for the map to the Grand Line.

episodes.name: Who Will Win? Showdown Between the True Powers of the Devil!
episodes.overview: Buggy's link to Shanks is revealed, and when he rips the straw hat Shanks gave Luffy, his rage knows no bounds. Who will win in this clash between Devil Fruit users?

episodes.name: The Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!
episodes.overview: Nami form an alliance becoming the navigator of the crew, but not a full member yet. They arrive in Syrup Village looking for a suitable ship. On this island they know the liar Usopp, who also has ties to the Shanx.

episodes.name: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!
episodes.overview: When trying to convince his rich friend, Kaya, to give the Straw Hats a ship, Usopp is told to stay away from her by her caretaker, Klahadore. However, when Usopp and Luffy later see him conversing with a strange man, they learn of a plot to kill Kaya.

episodes.name: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
episodes.overview: After learning of Captain Kuro's evil plan, Usopp runs back to the village to warn Kaya, only to find that after all his years of lying no one believes him.

episodes.name: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
episodes.overview: Usopp resolves to keep his story of pirates attacking the town a lie by making sure none reach it. Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Usopp then try to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay.

episodes.name: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats manage to take out most of the opposing Black Cat Pirates, so Jango orders the Nyaban Brothers to attack. Meanwhile, after getting hypnotized by Jango, Luffy gets himself stuck under the collapsed mast of the Black Cat Pirates' ship.

episodes.name: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!
episodes.overview: Captain Kuro himself arrives at the scene, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy being incapacitated, and the other two being too weak to handle him, things seem hopeless. However, Kaya herself appears to bargain with Kuro.

episodes.name: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!
episodes.overview: Zoro and Buchi (of the Nyaban Brothers) face off once again as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight. Usopp orders the Usopp Pirates to run away with Kaya, but Jango goes after them. A flashback reveals how Captain Kuro faked his death with Captain Morgan and how he became Kaya's butler.

episodes.name: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!
episodes.overview: As the fight between Luffy and Kuro is close to an end, the Usopp Pirates do their best to avoid Jango.

episodes.name: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!
episodes.overview: Kuro's ultimate attack, "Shakushi", attacks everything in the area, whether friend or foe, and Luffy becomes enraged by his lack of regard for his crew. Will Luffy's determination overcome Kuro's sheer speed?

episodes.name: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!
episodes.overview: With Usopp now in the crew and a new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure, only to encounter a strange man stuck in a treasure box that has also been looking for this treasure.

episodes.name: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!
episodes.overview: While Usopp & Luffy fool around with the ship's cannon one day, Zoro dreams about his childhood and the promise he made to Kuina.

episodes.name: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!
episodes.overview: The crew meets Johnny and Yosaku, Zoro's former companions, and they set sail for the Baratie restaurant in search of a cook.

episodes.name: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!
episodes.overview: Sanji, a cook at the Baratie, helps a starving pirate named Gin. Luffy begins his job as a waiter to pay for the damage he did to the Baratie, and tries to convince Sanji to join his crew.

episodes.name: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!
episodes.overview: Gin returns to the Baratie with his also-starving captain, Don Krieg, to whom Sanji once more gives food, but Don Krieg betrays the cook once he regains his energy.

episodes.name: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!
episodes.overview: It is revealed that Chef Zeff was a great pirate known as Red Leg Zeff. Gin explains the catastrophe the fleet met in Grand Line when they encountered Hawk-Eyes Mihawk, and Krieg attempts to take control of the Baratie.

episodes.name: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!
episodes.overview: As Nami steals the Going Merry, Mihawk has returned to finish the job, but Zoro challenges him to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

episodes.name: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!
episodes.overview: Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion and has Pearl, one of his stronger crewmates, attack, and Sanji reveals his fighting skills. Meanwhile Johnny and Yosaku leave with Usopp and the wounded Zoro to go after Nami.

episodes.name: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!
episodes.overview: With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

episodes.name: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!
episodes.overview: Gin finishes off Pearl, claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself. Still wounded, Sanji faces Gin while Luffy attacks Don Krieg.

episodes.name: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!
episodes.overview: When Gin refuses to kill Sanji, Krieg uses a poison gas on him. Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear.

episodes.name: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!
episodes.overview: Even after taking several hits from the Battle Spear, Luffy refuses to give up.

episodes.name: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!
episodes.overview: After the battle, Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg despite still being poisoned, and Sanji makes the difficult decision on whether to stay or to go with Luffy just as Yosaku comes back with news that he knows where Nami is.

episodes.name: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!
episodes.overview: The crew chases after Nami, who stole their ship, and Yosaku takes time during the trip to explain about Arlong and his Fishmen to Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro arrive at the island Nami docked at.

episodes.name: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!
episodes.overview: Zoro is captured by the fishmen after Usopp and Johnny ditch him, and it's revealed that Nami was part of Arlong's crew the entire time. When a group of Fishmen attack Cocoyashi Village, Usopp comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!
episodes.overview: After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.

episodes.name: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!
episodes.overview: Johnny tells the others about Nami killing Usopp, and Luffy does not believe them until Nami appears herself and confirms it. She tells them to stay out of her business and leave without her, but Luffy stubbornly decides to stay on the island. Usopp returns, revealing that Nami only pretended to kill him, and Nami's sister, Nojiko, starts to explain why Nami is acting the way she is.

episodes.name: Untold Past! Female Warrior Bellemere!
episodes.overview: Nojiko starts her story about Nami's childhood and their adopted mother, Bellemere. Despite being poor and none of them being related by blood, they had a happy life.

episodes.name: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!
episodes.overview: Nojiko continues her story, explaining how their life was ruined when the Arlong Pirates first took over the village.

episodes.name: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!
episodes.overview: When a marine officer under Arlong's pay confiscates all the money Nami stole over the years, in order to one day buy the village from Arlong, the villagers decide that enough is enough and fight back, despite Nami's pleads that they do not and that they'd all be killed. Upon seeing Nami's sorrow, the Straw Hats head for Arlong Park.

episodes.name: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. The Luffy Pirates!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats face the Fishmen themselves as the villagers watch from the sidelines.

episodes.name: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!
episodes.overview: Arlong has trapped Luffy in the ocean and Zoro faces the six-sword wielding octopus Hatchan.

episodes.name: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!
episodes.overview: With Hatchan defeated, two of the fishmen battle Sanji and Usopp. Things look grim for Sanji as he attempts to face Kuroobi underwater, and Usopp gets the chance to prove that he too is a brave warrior.

episodes.name: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!
episodes.overview: Arlong's officers have been defeated, but Sanji and Zoro prove to be no match for Arlong in their current state. However, with Luffy finally free, he just may be able to defeat the "most wicked man in the East Blue". Meanwhile, Nami finally gathers the courage to face Arlong.

episodes.name: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!
episodes.overview: Luffy returns to the fight, and the battle with Arlong versus Luffy begins.

episodes.name: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!
episodes.overview: The battle spreads into Arlong Park itself and Arlong is no longer holding back.

episodes.name: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!
episodes.overview: Arlong's reign of terror is over, and no one has anything on their mind except to party. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.name: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!
episodes.overview: As a result of defeating Buggy, Krieg and Arlong, Luffy now has the highest bounty in all of East Blue. News quickly spreads to Shanks, who celebrates Luffy's arrival into the world of pirates by partying with Mihawk, despite already being severely hungover.

episodes.name: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!
episodes.overview: After his fight with Luffy, Buggy was sent flying to another island with several body parts missing. Thus, Buggy begins his journey to find his crew and his body parts, making some unlikely friends.

episodes.name: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!
episodes.overview: With Buggy assumed to be dead, his crew fights over who will be the new captain, only to be captured by a tribe of cannibals.

episodes.name: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!
episodes.overview: The crew arrives at the last large town before the entrance to the Grand Line--Loguetown, the place where Gold Roger was both born and executed, where they stock up on supplies and sightsee. As Luffy heads for the execution platform where Roger was killed, old enemies are searching for him.

episodes.name: Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!
episodes.overview: While searching for new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mihawk, Zoro meets a woman named Tashigi, who looks exactly like an older Kuina, who then helps him look.

episodes.name: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!
episodes.overview: Usopp manages to anger the daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father, and finds his own life at stake. When Daddy discovers that Usopp is the son of Yasopp, the only man to beat him, he challenges him to a duel.

episodes.name: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. The Beautiful Chef!
episodes.overview: In order to win a rare fish, Sanji enters a cooking contest and faces a woman named Carmen.

episodes.name: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!
episodes.overview: Luffy arrives at the execution platform only to be caught in a trap by Buggy and Alvida.

episodes.name: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!
episodes.overview: Miraculously saved from death by an unnatural green gust and a lightning bolt to Buggy, the Straw Hats rush out of Loguetown, only for Zoro to be stopped by Tashigi and Luffy to be stopped by Captain Smoker.

episodes.name: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!
episodes.overview: On a stormy night a girl called Apis escapes from the Marines and arrives at Straw hat's ship, but the girl upon knowing that they are pirates begins to hide some of the reasons which she is being wanted by the Marines. As the Straw Hats escape from the Marines, they get caught in the Calm Belt.

episodes.name: Miraculous Creature! Apis's Secret and The Legendary Island!
episodes.overview: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament - stranded in the Calm Belt!

episodes.name: Eric Attacks! Great Escape From Warship Island!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats want to return Apis's dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like it's time for another daring escape!

episodes.name: A Solitary Island in the Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island!
episodes.overview: Even for Nami, finding the dragon's lost island proves to be tougher than looking for a needle in a haystack - or at the bottom of the ocean.

episodes.name: Showdown in the Ruins! Tense Zoro vs. Eric!
episodes.overview: Zoro is left fighting with Eric while Luffy and the gang run to the ship in order to get to Lost Island, but only find more problems.

episodes.name: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Commodore Nelson's Secret Strategy!
episodes.overview: At last Admiral Nelson has seen through the ambitions of Eric, but takes it a little too personally and now the mystical dragon's life is in danger.

episodes.name: Through the Sky They Soar! The 1000 Year Legend Lives Again!
episodes.overview: With his last breath, Ryuuji calls all his fellow dragons, and the Lost Island re-surfaced. Meanwhile Luffy takes out Admiral Nelson and his gang.

episodes.name: An Angry Showdown! Cross the Red Line!
episodes.overview: After leaving Warship Island the Going Merry is now towards the Grand Line, and the crew now returns to the Great Adventure.

1.name: East Blue
1.overview: Monkey D. Luffy meets the Red Hair Pirates as a young boy living in East Blue, swearing becoming the next Pirate King. 10 years later, Luffy sets sail and experiences first adventures, recruiting the first members of the Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.name: The First Line of Defence? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!
episodes.overview: Upon entering the Grand Line, the ship is swallowed by a giant whale, inside of which they discover a strange place. In addition, they are not the only ones there.

episodes.name: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!
episodes.overview: After hearing the story of Laboon the whale, Luffy comes up with a clever solution to his problems. From Laboon's caretaker, Crocus, the crew learns more about the Grand Line and how to navigate through it, since compasses are useless there.

episodes.name: A Town that Welcomes Pirates? Setting Foot on Whisky Peak!
episodes.overview: Luffy and friends arrive at Whisky Peak, a town of pirate-lovers who hold them a feast.

episodes.name: Explosion! The Three Swords Style! Zoro vs. Baroque Works!
episodes.overview: Zoro battles a hundred members of Baroque Works, and discovers there is more to them than meets the eye.

episodes.name: All Out Battle! Luffy vs. Zoro, Mysterious Grand Duel!
episodes.overview: Luffy, who does not realize the town is full of bounty hunters, engages in a battle with Zoro after he discovers that Zoro attacked the townsfolk, while Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine head for Princess Vivi.

episodes.name: Deliver Princess Vivi! The Luffy Pirates Set Sail!
episodes.overview: Luffy's crew manages to become targets of Crocodile, one of the Shichibukai, and decide to help Princess Vivi. They also meet Miss All-Sunday, the second strongest member of Baroque Works and partner of Crocodile.

episodes.name: Try Hard, Coby! Coby and Helmeppo's Struggles in the Marines!
episodes.overview: As Luffy and his crew are sailing in the Grand Line, Koby and Helmeppo are stuck doing odd-jobs for the marines back in East Blue, and encounter Vice-Admiral Garp.

episodes.name: Coby and Helmeppo's Resolve! Vice-Admiral Garp's Parental Affection!
episodes.overview: Vice Admiral Garp mentors Koby and Helmeppo to become marines.

episodes.name: An Ancient Island! The Shadow Hiding in Little Garden!
episodes.overview: Luffy and friends land on Little Garden, a prehistoric island inhabited by dinosaurs and giants.

episodes.name: Huge Duel! The Giants Dorry and Broggy!
episodes.overview: Nami and Usopp meet a giant named Brogy, while Luffy and Vivi encounter Brogy's rival, Dorry. The Straw Hats little suspect that Officer Agents of Baroque Works are on their tail.

episodes.name: Luffy Gets Angry! A Dirty Trick Violates the Sacred Duel!
episodes.overview: Dorry, critically injured by exploding ale, blames the Straw Hats. Luffy is enraged that someone would pull such a cowardly trick to sabotage the giants' honorable duel.

episodes.name: Broggy's Bitter Tears of Victory! The Conclusion of Elbaf!
episodes.overview: Luffy tries in vain to convince the injured Dorry not to fight Brogy. The Officer Agents who sabotaged Dorry's ale further tamper with the giants' duel.

episodes.name: The Devilish Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger!
episodes.overview: Having subdued the giants, Baroque Works makes their move. Mr. 3 introduces Zoro, Nami, Vivi, and Brogy to the slow torture of becoming living statues of wax.

episodes.name: A Hex on Luffy! Colors Trap!
episodes.overview: Luffy attempts to rescue his friends but only accelerates the deadly waxing process. To make matters worse, Miss Goldenweek interferes and reveals her own terrifying ability.

episodes.name: Time to Fight Back! Usopp’s Quick Thinking and Fire Star!
episodes.overview: Usopp frees Luffy from Miss Goldenweek's control. With Karoo's help, Usopp and Luffy rescue the others, who take on Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine. Luffy and Karoo pursue Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek into the forest.

episodes.name: Farewell Giant Island! Head for Alabasta!
episodes.overview: After having a pleasant chat with Mr. 0 and encountering the "Unluckies", Sanji retrieves an Eternal Pose for Alabasta. The crew leaves Little Garden and sets sail for Alabasta.

2.name: Whisky Peak & Little Garden
2.overview:
With a Log Pose now in hand, the Straw Hat Pirates are directed toward Whisky Peak, a town that welcomes pirates with open arms and treats them like celebrities. However, the townsfolk have a dark secret, and an even deeper mystery awaits.

Now with Vivi in tow, the Straw Hat Pirates travel to the prehistoric island of Little Garden. There, they encounter two Giants, Dorry and Brogy, who have been dueling one another on the island for the past century. After befriending the giants, the crew are ambushed by new and familiar officers of Baroque Works.

episodes.name: Nami's Sick? Beyond the Snow Falling on the Sea!
episodes.overview: Nami is sick, but the crew doesn't have a doctor to help her.

episodes.name: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!
episodes.overview: While looking for a doctor, the crew meets the pirate Wapol, who attacks them, but only makes Luffy send him flying. Meanwhile Smoker manages to intercept the conversation between Mr. 0 and Sanji and plans to go to Alabasta. Back with the crew they arrive at last to an island only to find out they're not welcome.

episodes.name: An Island without Doctors? Adventure in a Nameless Land!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat crew manages to gain the trust of the people that attacked them, and are taken to the village, except for Zoro and Carue, who guard the ship. Luffy and Sanji must take Nami to the island's sole doctor who lives on a mountain-top. Vivi and Usopp discover the past of the island, and about the pirate Wapol from Dalton.

episodes.name: Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!
episodes.overview: While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, the islander's worst nightmare turns true, as Wapol returns to the island. The doctor is discovered to be on the other side of the island, and Usopp, Vivi and Dalton rush to find her. Dalton however returns as he hears of Wapol's return.

episodes.name: Dalton's Resolve! Wapol's Corps Lands on the Island!
episodes.overview: Dalton faces Wapol, but only gets himself hit by arrows thrown by his former comrade Chess. An avalanche stops the battle, but injures Sanji. Luffy must carry both Nami and Sanji to the doctor, and begins his ascent.

episodes.name: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!
episodes.overview: The Lapahn help Luffy escape from Wapol, giving him enough time to climb to the castle where doctor Kureha lives. Vivi, Usopp and Zoro deal with the king's army in order to save Dalton. The recovering Nami meets a strange creature.

episodes.name: Blue-nosed Reindeer! Chopper's Secret!
episodes.overview: Nami asks Chopper to join the crew, but he isn't interested. Kureha tells Nami some of what was Chopper's background. After realizing the abilities that Chopper has, Luffy is eager to make him join the crew.

episodes.name: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!
episodes.overview: Doctorine continues to tell how Chopper lived his life and how the quack doctor Hiruluk took care of him.

episodes.name: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!
episodes.overview: More of Chopper's past is revealed, including the fate of doctor Hiruluk and Wapol's cruelties as the king. Meanwhile, Wapol reaches the castle where the crew is residing.

episodes.name: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!
episodes.overview: Wapol is determined to bring down Hiruluk's flag, and to do that, he engages Sanji, Luffy and Chopper in a fight.

episodes.name: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!
episodes.overview: Chopper demonstrates the abilities of Rumble Balls when fighting Chessmarimo. Dalton is uncovered from the avalanche.

episodes.name: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!
episodes.overview: After trying every trick in the castle, Wapol is finally hunted down by Luffy. The villagers along with Zoro, Vivi and Usopp start their ascent to the castle through a ropeway.

episodes.name: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!
episodes.overview: After finally been convinced to join the team, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha, who doesn't take it too well; but after escaping from the castle, she has decided to give the whole Straw Hat crew a farewell gift.

episodes.name: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!
episodes.overview: Chopper joins the Straw Hat crew as they continue their journey to Vivi's homeland.

3.name: Drum Island
3.overview: After Nami falls ill with an unknown disease, the Straw Hat Pirates travel to Drum Island in search of a doctor. The crew meets a bizarre talking reindeer named Tony Tony Chopper, who helps them fend off the country's former despot king Wapol after he returns to reclaim his throne.

episodes.name: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!
episodes.overview: Crocodile appears to stop rampaging pirates. Luffy and his crew meet Mr.  2 Bon Clay who shows off his devil fruit power and Vivi sees a shocking  sight.

episodes.name: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summing Powder and the Rebel Army!
episodes.overview: Luffy separates from the rest of the crew, right after arriving at  Alabasta's port city of Nanohana. The crew dons disguises while Luffy  learns of Dance Powder.

episodes.name: The Heroes Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!
episodes.overview: While in Nanohana, the Straw Hats encounter Smoker and Tashigi. A powerful pirate named Portgas D. Ace appears.

episodes.name: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!
episodes.overview: Ace fights Smoker while the Straw Hats run for their ship. Luffy  reunites with his brother, who has joined the Whitebeard Pirates after  leaving home, and is searching for a former crewmate named Blackbeard  who killed a fellow member.

episodes.name: Erumalu, The City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!!
episodes.overview: Ace decides to travel with the Straw Hats, as he is hunting for a man known as Blackbeard.

episodes.name: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!
episodes.overview: After leaving Erumalu, the Straw Hats plus Vivi & Ace continue through the desert, facing the many dangers of it.

episodes.name: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!
episodes.overview: Nami and Vivi found themselves an easier way to travel in the desert and leave all men behind.

episodes.name: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!
episodes.overview: After hearing that a small village has fake Rebel Army bodyguards that  have been keeping peace, Vivi asks the men of the crew to test if  they're worthy of staying.

episodes.name: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream Vowed to Vivi!
episodes.overview: Still trekking through the Alabasta desert, the crew beats up a giant  desert scorpion for lunch, while Vivi tells Nami about her past and her  friendship with Kohza.

episodes.name: Showdown in a Heat Haze! Ace vs. the Gallant Scorpion!
episodes.overview: Ace fights against a bounty hunter, who claims to have defeated  Blackbeard, although this was a lie to lure Ace out and challenge him in  order to inspire his children to follow their dreams.

episodes.name: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends, and the Country's Form!
episodes.overview: Zoro, Chopper and Luffy manage to get themselves lost and stumble across some huge underground ruins.

episodes.name: Spiders Café at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!
episodes.overview: Baroque Works plan starts to take effect, and for that, the Number Agents gather to meet Mr. 0. Meanwhile, the crew finds out that the Rebel Army has moved out of Yuba and headed to Katorea, and the rebel leader Kohza is determined to attack.

episodes.name: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line!
episodes.overview: In Yuba, Luffy learns that Toto was entrusted by Cobra to watch over the land and figures out a way to stop the sandstorm.

episodes.name: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams!
episodes.overview: After the struggle, Vivi decides to go after Crocodile with the Straw  Hats. The crew travels to the city of Rainbase, but run afoul of Smoker  and Tashigi.

episodes.name: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!
episodes.overview: Most of the Straw Hats, along with Smoker, are trapped by Crocodile.  Vivi reunites with the royal guardian Pell, but is captured by Miss  All-Sunday. Crocodile reveals his invincible Devil Fruit power.

episodes.name: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!
episodes.overview: Baroque Works' plan to take over Alabasta is set in motion.

episodes.name: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!
episodes.overview: Most of the Straw Hats are helplessly trapped as Vivi tries desperately  to get the key to their cage. but fails. Crocodile is contacted by  someone known as "Mr. Prince."

episodes.name: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!
episodes.overview: The identity of "Mr. Prince" is revealed.

episodes.name: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs. Crocodile!
episodes.overview: After escaping from Rain Dinners, the Straw Hats and Vivi cross the desert to Alubarne, where the final battle will take place.

episodes.name: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land!
episodes.overview: Luffy is left for dead by Crocodile, but is helped by the mysteríous  Miss All-Sunday. The rest of the Straw Hats reach Alubarna.

episodes.name: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna!
episodes.overview: The revolution is on the verge of starting and the crew comes out with a plan that could stop it.

episodes.name: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo!
episodes.overview: Vivi tries to call out to the Rebel Army, but fails because of a Baroque Works infiltrator in the Royal Army interferes.

episodes.name: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4!
episodes.overview: Things look hopeless for Usopp & Chopper as they continue to suffer from every attack that the Mr.4 team makes. However, the tides may be beginning to turn as Usopp learns what it truly means to be a man.

episodes.name: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage!
episodes.overview: Albeit severely beaten and bruised, Usopp and Chopper have finally defeated the Mr.4 team. However, Mr. 2 has figured out Sanji's weakness.

episodes.name: Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!
episodes.overview: Though Mr. 2 discovers Sanji's weakness, Sanji still defeats his opponent after an evenly-matched fight. Meanwhile, before Vivi could give the word to blow up the palace, Crocodile appears.

episodes.name: Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Takt Burst!
episodes.overview: Nami faces off against Miss Doublefinger and tries to figure out her new weapon that Usopp made, the Clima-Tact.

episodes.name: Secret Passed Down in the Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!
episodes.overview: While Crocodile reveals to Vivi about the ancient weapon Pluton, Nami attempts to defeat Miss Doublefinger with her most powerful attack: The Tornado Tempo.

episodes.name: Secret of Powerful Swordplay! Ability to Cut Steel and the Rhythm Things Have!
episodes.overview: While Miss. Doublefinger's fight with Nami was challenging, Zoro is having an even more difficult time fighting Mr.1: A man who can change his entire body into steel - something that Zoro cannot cut. As Zoro nears death, he must discover the secret to "the breath of all things".

episodes.name: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!
episodes.overview: When Vivi reveals Crocodile's plan to Koza, he attempts to stop the fighting, but is shot. Crocodile reveals that he has set up a massive bomb in the city.

episodes.name: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!
episodes.overview: As Koza tries to stop the Rebel Army, both sides are once more fighting due to the intervention of Baroque Works. Vivi is thrown to her certain death when Luffy saves her and challenges Crocodile to a second round.

episodes.name: Sand Croc and Water Luffy! The Second Round of the Duel
episodes.overview: Luffy fights Crocodile with more success this time by using water, but still loses this round. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats hurry to locate the bomb before it goes off. Nico Robin forces the king to take her to the tomb where the Pluton Poneglyph is hidden.

episodes.name: That Looks Croc-ish! Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!
episodes.overview: Crocodile joins Robin in the tomb, and orders her to translate the Poneglyph. Robin tells him that Pluton was not mentioned and that it was only about history, but Crocodile figures out that she was lying and stabs her in response. When Luffy recovers from the last round of fighting, he chases after Crocodile into the tomb.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Draws Near! This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base!
episodes.overview: Luffy fights with Crocodile by using blood on his fists. Meanwhile Vivi finds the bomb, and calls the Straw Hats together.

episodes.name: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country!
episodes.overview: Vivi finds the bomb inside of the clock tower, but the Mr. 7 pair of Baroque Works are there to protect it. Vivi defeats them, but she realizes the bomb cannot be stopped so easily. It has a timer, and right before it blows up, Pell shows up and takes it into the atmosphere, where he sacrifices himself to save Alabasta.

episodes.name: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta!
episodes.overview: Luffy defeats Crocodile by punching him through solid bedrock. When Crocodile falls, the rain-drops calm the soldiers.

episodes.name: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!
episodes.overview: Now that the battle has ended, the outcome is tallied. Igaram appears with proof of Cobra's innocence, as well as Koza telling everything. Tashigi and Smoker both are rewarded for taking on Crocodile, but neither one of them believes that is right, considering the Straw Hat pirates did all the work.

episodes.name: The Pirates' Banquet and Operation Escape from Alabasta!
episodes.overview: Luffy is rescued from the collapsed tomb where he fought Crocodile and brought into Cobra's palace to rest. When he awakens, a magnificent banquet is thrown for the pirates, then, the Straw Hats are invited to enjoy the hot spring steam room inside the palace.

episodes.name: It All Started On That Day! Vivi Tells the Story of Her Adventure!
episodes.overview: It's the day for Vivi's speech and her decision whether or not to continue to be with the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Bon Kurei and his crew attempt to protect the Straw Hats from Hina.

episodes.name: Scent of Danger! The Seventh Member is Nico Robin!
episodes.overview: The Marines fail again to catch the Straw Hats. After escaping from Marines, Nico Robin (Ms. All Sunday) appears from inside of Straw Hats ship. She manages to persuade the crew to let her join. Pell is seen at the end standing over his own grave.

4.name: Alabasta
4.overview: The Straw Hats, with Kureha's assistant Tony Tony Chopper, finally arrive at Arabasta, which is on the verge of civil war. Vivi must reach the rebels and tell them the real cause behind the conflict, but Crocodile, leader of Baroque Works and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, will not just stand by and watch. In the end, Baroque Works, marine forces, pirates, the royal guards, and the rebel army clash in a battle that will determine the fate of the country itself.

episodes.name: The First Patient! The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball!
episodes.overview: After their adventures in Alabasta, the crew come upon another deserted island and split up tasks amongst themselves. Chopper is left in charge of guarding the ship, and he reminisces about the day he first made the rumble ball and his first patient, Dr. Kureha, while spending some time with the newest crewmember: Nico Robin.

episodes.name: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!
episodes.overview: A weird salesman is fished out of the water and onto the Going Merry, and Nami buys a ton of "1000 year paper" from him to draw her sea maps. However, that's not going to be easy with the rest of the crew goofing off as usual.

episodes.name: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry!
episodes.overview: The Going Merry runs into several Marine ships in some fog, and the Straw Hats meet a trainee Marine chef named Tajiyo. Sanji helps him out of a bit of cooking trouble.

episodes.name: I Will Make it Bloom! Usopp, the Man, and the Eight-Foot Shell!
episodes.overview: The crew stops on an island that's having its annual fireworks festival; Usopp meets a young fireworks-maker named Kodama and helps her achieve her dream.

episodes.name: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, the Wandering Swordsman!
episodes.overview: Zoro has a flashback about the time when he first met Johnny and Yosaku, and faced off against Bandits and, Dick.

episodes.name: Zenny of the Island of Goats and the Pirate Ship in the Mountains!
episodes.overview: After escaping from several Marine ships, the Straw Hats land on an uncharted island and meet an old man named Zenny. Chopper finds out that, because of his bad heart, Zenny probably only has three days to live.

episodes.name: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats help Zenny out, hoping to make his last days good ones; they learn about Zenny's past as a money lender, and his dream of becoming a pirate. But Zoro realizes that Zenny has outlived Chopper's predictions and so the straw hats decide that, after helping him finish his pirate ship, they will leave the island.

episodes.name: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!
episodes.overview: Zenny decides to follow his dream and become a pirate, despite his age. He helps the Straw Hats out of trouble with the Marines, and then they part ways.

episodes.name: Legend of the Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo of Luluka Island!
episodes.overview: On Ruluka Island, some of the Straw Hats make enemies of the Mayor and his men, who have placed high taxes on everything. Robin, Usopp, and Luffy meet Professor Henzo, who's doing research on the island's rainbow mist. When some of the mist shows up, Henzo borrows the Going Merry to go explore it.

episodes.name: Residents of the Land of Eternity! The Pumpkin Pirates!
episodes.overview: The inside of the Rainbow Mist full of wrecked ships and treasure, and is guarded by five kids. The kids are actually friends of Henzo's that got lost in the mist over 50 years ago.

episodes.name: Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!
episodes.overview: Henzo, his friends, and the others try to find a way out of the ship graveyard. Meanwhile, the Mayor and his men let the information about the Rainbow Mist slip to the remaining Straw Hats still on Ruluka.

episodes.name: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton's Schemes and the Rainbow Tower!
episodes.overview: Luffy accidentally propels himself and Rapanui to the end of the mist. Nami appears in the ship graveyard with a rowboat full of treasure and a string connected to the real world, which are both stolen by Wetton's subordinate. The Mayor uses the Rainbow Tower to make a bridge to the Rainbow Mist.

episodes.name: And so, the Legend Begins! To the Other Side of the Rainbow!
episodes.overview: The Going Merry escapes from the Rainbow Mist, getting badly damaged on the way. The Mayor gets arrested by a bunch of powerful marines that turn out to be older versions of Henzo's friends, who were thrown 50 years into the past by the Rainbow Mist's collapse.

5.name: Post-Alabasta, Goat Island & Ruluka Island
5.overview: While on the run from some Marines, the crew stumble upon an island inhabited by a man named Zenny who lives with a herd of goats. The crew set out to him in his seemingly final days. After evading some Marines, the crew stop off in a small town with a huge tower, which is also being oppressed by the Mayor whose overtaxing the citizens. But a bigger concern is a nearby mist that prevents anyone who enters it from leaving.

episodes.name: The Log is Taken! Salvage King, Masira!
episodes.overview: Nami's log pose begins to point to the sky, and the crew finds a map of an island named 'Skypiea' on a 200-year-old ship. They compete with the monkey-like Masira's salvage crew while they search for more clues on how to get there.

episodes.name: Monsters Appear! Don't Mess with the Whitebeard Pirates!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats decide to go to Jaya island to look for information on Skypeia. Meanwhile, Ace suddenly shows up on Buggy's ship; Buggy does not let any of his men attack Ace, fearing Whitebeard's retribution.

episodes.name: Quit Dreaming! Mock Town, the Town of Ridicule!
episodes.overview: Jaya's main town is full of famous pirates that are constantly brawling with each other. Luffy and Zoro have a run-in with a pirate known as 'Bellamy the Hyena,' who ridicules their dreams and beats them up.

episodes.name: Distinguished Pirates! A Man Who Talks of Dreams and the King of Undersea Search!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Zoro and Nami meet the man who is later revealed to be Blackbeard. They leave Mock Town, and get into a fight with Masira's brother Shoujou, another salvage monkey.

episodes.name: Legendary Family! Noland, the Liar!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats meet with Mont Blanc Cricket on another part of Jaya; Cricket is a descendant of Montblanc Noland, an infamous "liar" who told of a gold city on Jaya, and Cricket was outcast for looking for artifacts of the gold city. He may be the only person who knows how to get to Skypiea.

episodes.name: Steer for the Clouds! Capture the South Bird!
episodes.overview: Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical current called the Knock-Up Stream to get to Skypeia. However, they first have to catch a southbird to point them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean.

episodes.name: Dreams Don't Come True?! Bellamy Versus the Saruyama Alliance!
episodes.overview: While the Straw Hats are looking for a Southbird, Bellamy and his crew attack Cricket's house, and steal the gold artifacts he'd collected over the years from his salvage work. When the Straw Hats return and see what happened, Luffy decides to take a side trip back to Mock Town.

episodes.name: 100 Million Man! World's Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!
episodes.overview: Luffy takes out Bellamy with a single punch. Meanwhile, the world government heads are concerned over Whitebeard, Shanks, and Luffy. The marines try to decide who will replace Crocodile as a Shichibukai - one of Blackbeard's crew shows up uninvited and nominates his captain.

episodes.name: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!
episodes.overview: The Going Merry is refitted by Masira and Shoujou to be more flight capable, and the Straw Hats catch a ride on the Knock-Up Stream for Skypeia.

episodes.name: Sail the White Sea! The Sky Knight and the Gate in the Clouds!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats arrive in an ocean above the clouds. Usopp almost falls out of the Going Merry but is saved at the last minute. The crew is also attacked by a mysterious looking warrior, but is saved by the Knight of the Sky. Finally, they arrive at the border which transports them to the upper realm, Skypiea.

episodes.name: Godland, Skypiea! Angels on a Beach of Clouds!
episodes.overview: As the crew arrives in Skypiea, they are greeted by Conis and her pet Su. Both she and her father start explaining how the life in Skypiea is and how the different Dials work.

episodes.name: The Forbidden Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Lives and Heaven's Judgement!
episodes.overview: Nami finds out what should happen to anyone who enters the forest. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang are waiting for the wind to change but are rudely assaulted by Skypiea's police who are going to carry out Heaven's Judgement.

episodes.name: Already Criminals?! Skypiea's Upholder of the Law!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats have some problems with the local justice enforcer force called "The White Berets."

episodes.name: Is Escape Possible?!? God's Challenge is Set in Motion
episodes.overview: While trying to escape from Sky Island, Robin, Chopper, Nami and Zoro are held hostages by God Enel.

episodes.name: A Trap on Lovely Street! The Almighty Eneru
episodes.overview: Conis leads Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji to a boat to get to Upper Yard, but she tells them it is a trap and almost gets hit by "Heaven's Judgment".

episodes.name: Onward Little Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Usopp and Sanji finally enter Upper Yard, only to find out that the whole road is trapped heavily, but at last they arrive at the Ordeal Gates. Meanwhile Robin, Zoro, and Nami go out to explore Upper Yard while Chopper stays behind to guard the ship.

episodes.name: 10% Survival Rate! Satori, the Mantra Master!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp enter the Ordeal of Balls gate and encounter the Priest Satori.

episodes.name: The Ordeal of Spheres! Desperate Struggle in the Lost Forest!
episodes.overview: Usopp, Sanji and Luffy fight Satori, but the power of Mantra seems to be too strong.

episodes.name: Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!
episodes.overview: Chopper, threatened by priest Shura, blows the whistle for Gan Fall to come, but before he can arrive, Priest Shura assaults Chopper and begins destroying the Going Merry.

episodes.name: Profound Mystery! Ordeal of String and Ordeal of Love?!?
episodes.overview: Gan Fall cannot handle Shura and lost the battle. Meanwhile, Satori is finally defeated by Luffy and Sanji.

episodes.name: Light the Fire of Shandora! Wyper the Warrior!
episodes.overview: Chopper is saved by a bunch of giant Southbirds, who tell him that Gan Fall was actually God. Nami, Zoro and Robin discover the reason why Upper Yard is a soil island: It was once part of Jaya, and this is the part that Liar Noland saw. Meanwhile the Shandia attack Upper Yard.

episodes.name: Jaya, City of Gold in the Sky! Head for God's Shrine!
episodes.overview: The Shandia attack on Upper Yard has started. The crew is finally reunited, and everyone speaks up about what has happened. Chopper takes care of Gan Fall, and the pirates plan to steal the gold on the island.

episodes.name: Festival on the Night Before Gold-Hunting! Feelings for "Vearth!"
episodes.overview: After befriending a wolf pack, Gan Fall tells the crew a little more about the history of Upper Yard.

episodes.name: Enter God Eneru! Farewell to the Survivors!
episodes.overview: Enel takes away the limitations of the priests. Also, Usopp witnesses a mysterious person fixing the ship; the next day Merry is found to be back to her original form. After getting her off the altar, the pirates plan out their course of action.

episodes.name: A Giant Snake Bares Its Fangs! The Survival Game Begins!
episodes.overview: A giant python makes Luffy, Robin, Chopper and Zoro split while going to the ruins at the south.

episodes.name: The Deadly Reject! War Demon Wyper's Resolve!
episodes.overview: Wyper takes out Shura and tells his goal to the Shandia, and Enel speaks up about how many people will be alive by the end of his plan.

episodes.name: Fierce Mid-Air Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Warrior Braham!
episodes.overview: Zoro fights the Shandia warrior Braham, and defeats him with Ittoryu (one sword style) 36 Pound Cannon technique.

episodes.name: The Roaring Burn Bazooka!! Pirate Luffy vs. War Demon Wyper!
episodes.overview: Luffy fights Wyper, but after some time, he falls into some underground ruins. Meanwhile, Enel appears on the Going Merry and after telling that his true goal was the City of Gold, he takes out both Usopp and Sanji; then he vanishes and leaves Satori's brothers: Hotori and Kotori to avenge him.

episodes.name: The Ordeal of Swamp! Chopper vs Priest Gedatsu!
episodes.overview: Chopper is attacked by Gedatsu, who turns out to be a complete moron, and eventually defeats him, sending him plummeting to the Blue Sea. Conis and Pagaya help Aisa, and head to Upper Yard.

episodes.name: Unbeatable Powers! Eneru's True Form is Revealed!
episodes.overview: Enel defeats several members of the Shandia Tribe. Meanwhile, Gan Fall and Nami start and finish their fight with Kotori and Hotori. Hotori is defeated by Nami while Kotori is defeated by Gan Fall.

episodes.name: A Mystical City! The Grand Ruins of Shandora!
episodes.overview: While Robin is looking at some ruins she found, Yama, The Chief Enforcer, attacks her. Yama is easily defeated by Robin. Later, she discovers the legendary city, Shandora.

episodes.name: 0% Survival Rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the Sword Wielding Priest!
episodes.overview: Priest Ohm appears and starts fighting everyone.

episodes.name: Climb Giant Jack! Deadly Combat in the Upper Ruins!
episodes.overview: At the Upper Ruins, the fight between Ohm, Zoro, Gan Fall and Wyper begins. When Nami appears, she is swallowed by the giant python, along with Gan Fall and Aisa.

episodes.name: The Ordeal of Iron! White Barbed Death Match!
episodes.overview: Ohm makes matters worse, creating a barbed wire cage around the area. Laki is knocked out by Enel, and Nami, Aisa, and Gan Fall find out why the python was rampaging so much.

episodes.name: Bursting Slash! Zoro vs Ohm!
episodes.overview: Zoro finally defeats Priest Ohm with his 108 Pound Cannon technique. Meanwhile Pagaya and Conis hear the terrible truth about the goal of Enel: to eradicate every person in the sky.

episodes.name: Collapsing Upper Ruins! The Quintet for the Finale!
episodes.overview: Enel appears only to reduce the group as close to his prediction as he can.

episodes.name: Showdown in the Ancient Ruins! Sky God Eneru's Goal!
episodes.overview: Enel counterattacks Gan Fall and lands a finishing hit. He then knocks out Robin as she tries to manipulate him. Zoro impresses Enel with his power but is easily beaten, while trying to make him pay for what he did to Robin; but it takes Wyper with a secret weapon to take Enel down.

episodes.name: Ambition Towards the Endless Vearth! The Ark Maxim!
episodes.overview: Enel defeats Zoro and Wyper. Upon seeing this, Nami follows him to a cave where his ark, Maxim, is. Luffy finally gets out of the snake, along with Aisa, only to find out the outcome of the fight against Enel. When Aisa tells him that she knows where he is, he asks her to take him there.

episodes.name: They Finally Clash! Pirate Luffy vs God Eneru!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Enel start fighting. Conis tells the dangers of staying in Sky Island to the other Skypieans.

episodes.name: Maxim Surfaces! Deathpiea is Activated!
episodes.overview: The fight between Enel and Luffy continues with Enel starting a machine that would bring the death of Skypiea: Deathpiea.

episodes.name: Luffy Falls! Eneru's Judgement and Nami's Wish!
episodes.overview: Luffy falls from the ark. Nami starts fighting Enel while Sanji and Usopp try to rescue her.

episodes.name: The Two Awaken! On the Front Lines of the Burning Love Rescue!
episodes.overview: Usopp and Sanji split up to rescue Nami, but the first one to get on deck is Usopp.

episodes.name: Capriccio for Despair! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!
episodes.overview: Enel's thunderclouds are coming down to Sky Island while the evacuation is half complete.

episodes.name: Lead by a Bell's Sound! Tale of the Great Warrior and the Explorer!
episodes.overview: The history of Noland and Kalgara is told, as a flashback from Wyper.

episodes.name: Free From the Spell! The Great Warrior Sheads Tears!
episodes.overview: Noland and Kalgara are enjoying themselves, as well as the villagers and Noland's crew, but that changes one day, as the villagers start hating their new friends.

episodes.name: Eternal Friends! The Vowed Bell Echoes Across the Mighty Seas!
episodes.overview: The cause of the hatred is discovered and explained. Meanwhile, Kalgara vows to meet Noland again.

episodes.name: Angel Island, Obliterated! The Horror of The Raigo's Advent!!
episodes.overview: Angel Island is destroyed by Enel's attacks. Luffy decides to go and ring the golden bell before Enel takes it away.

episodes.name: Knock Over Giant Jack! Last Hope for Escape!
episodes.overview: Nami finds out a way to get to Enel, by cutting down Giant Jack. Wyper finds out from Robin that Noland has a descendant that is searching for the Gold City, and that's the reason why Luffy wants to ring the Golden Bell.

episodes.name: Miracle on Skypiea! The Love Song Heard in the Clouds!
episodes.overview: Luffy battles Enel. Battle for Skypiea!

episodes.name: The Battle Ends! Proud Fantasia Echoes Far!
episodes.overview: The 400 year war on Sky Island comes to an end. Montblanc Cricket and the Masira Brothers hear the Golden Bell ringing and realize that the Gold City was always in the sky. Enel, who was thrown to the Blue Sea heads out to the Fairy Vearth (the Moon). The Sky People (both Skypieans and Shandia) celebrate the end of the war with a great bonfire.

episodes.name: I Made it here! The Yarn the Poneglyphs Spin!
episodes.overview: Robin deciphers the poneglyphs on the Golden Bell and realizes how to find the Rio Poneglyph. She also discovers that the poneglyphs on the Bell were written by Gol D. Roger, who could understand poneglyphs, who had discovered the Rio Poneglyph, and had once visited Skypiea. Soon afterwards, the Straw Hats steal a bunch of gold from the Giant Anaconda's belly and they begin to leave Skypiea.

episodes.name: Off to the Blue Sea!! A Heartfelt Finale!!
episodes.overview: The Golden Bell rings as the Straw Hats are going down to the sea, meaning that they are welcome and are deeply thankful for what they did. When the ship finally rests on the sea, problems appear, as the ship has landed in a Marine base.

6.name: Skypiea
6.overview: The Straw Hats arrive on the Sky Island Skypiea and learn of its connections to Jaya and Mont Blanc Noland's tale of a lost city of gold. As the crew embarks in search of treasure, they become entangled in a three-way war between the native Skypieans, the vengeful Shandians, and the land's cruel "god", Enel.

episodes.name: A State of Emergency is Issued! A Notorious Pirate Ship has Infiltrated!
episodes.overview: The Marines are convinced the Going Merry is a ghost ship after it  crashes inside their fortress from above. The crew members are scattered  around the premises.

episodes.name: Sanji the Cook! Proving His Merit at the Marine Dining Hall!
episodes.overview: In disguise, Sanji shows the Marine chefs the proper way to prepare a meal.

episodes.name: Captured Zoro! Chopper's Emergency Operations!
episodes.overview: Zoro is taken prisoner as Chopper and Nami assist a nervous doctor in treating injured Marines.

episodes.name: The Marines Dragnet Closes In! The Second Member Captured!
episodes.overview: Robin and Usopp both disguise themselves as the same visiting inspector,  and Usopp is thrown in the brig with Zoro. Luffy and Sanji are  discovered by Jonathan after a slight mishap.

episodes.name: Luffy and Sanji's Daring Rescue Mission!
episodes.overview: The real Inspector is thrown in the brig with Zoro and Usopp, while  Sanji and Luffy race to rescue the two while avoiding detection.

episodes.name: Enter the Hot-Blooded Special Forces! Battle on the Bridge!
episodes.overview: Sanji and Luffy, after freeing Usopp and Zoro, try to escape Navarone.  As the Burning Soul combat unit is deployed, Dr. Kobato leads Nami and  Chopper to the docks.

episodes.name: Breaking Through the Seige! The Going Merry is Recovered!
episodes.overview: The crew meets at the docks and are surrounded by Marines. Using Nami as their fake hostage, they trick the Marines into letting them back on the Going Merry.

episodes.name: The Pirate Ship Disappears! Fortress Battle, Round #2!
episodes.overview: The crew disguises the Going Merry as a Marine ship so they can get their treasure back. With the gold, they decide they’ll hire a shipwright.

episodes.name: The Gold and Waver Recovery Operations!
episodes.overview: Usopp splits up the crew into two teams: the gold retrieval team and the waver retrieval team. Inspector Shepherd decides to catch Luffy on his own.

episodes.name: The One Fell Swoop Plan! Jonathan's Surefire Secret Tactic!
episodes.overview: Sanji, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin continue to search for their treasure. Luffy leads Nami to the captain’s quarters where they retrieve their gold.

episodes.name: Farewell, Marine Fortress! The Last Battle for Escape!
episodes.overview: The Going Merry is grounded during a period of low tide and Jonathan believes they’ve reached “checkmate”. They cleverly use the impact dial to boost the ship and the breath and flame dials to inflate the octopus balloon again so they can escape.

episodes.name: Great Adventure at Long Ring Long Land!
episodes.overview: Luffy and company come across a mysterious pirate ship after trying to escape a giant wave. Soon, they arrive on an island inhabited by strange animals. Going Merry is captured by the Foxy Pirate crew.

episodes.name: A Davy Back with the Foxy Pirates!
episodes.overview: After Tonjit re-unites with his horse, they are soon attacked by Captain Foxy and his subordinates, who challenge Luffy in a Davy Back Fight, a contest of pirates where the stakes are members of the crew.

episodes.name: Round 1! One Lap of the Donut Race!
episodes.overview: The first round of Davy Back Fight involves a race around the island with tiny boats. Zoro's and Chopper's boat is eliminated.

episodes.name: Silver Fox Foxy! The Merciless Interference!
episodes.overview: With only Luffy, Nami, and Porche's boat remaining, it's an all out war to the goal, but after Foxy exposes his Devil Fruit powers, Porche wins and takes Tony Tony Chopper from Luffy. The second round prepares to start.

episodes.name: Round 2! Shoot it into the Groggy Ring!
episodes.overview: Without Chopper, Sanji and Zoro must face the Foxy Pirates in a ball game, but are hampered by their blatant cheating and the crooked referee.

episodes.name: A Barrage of Red Cards in Groggy Ring!
episodes.overview: The bickering rivals Sanji and Zoro manage to overcome the opposing team by working together. Luffy chooses Tonjit's horse, Shelly over Chopper.

episodes.name: Round 3! The Round-and-Round Roller Race!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats face Foxy a race around a giant ring on roller skates.

episodes.name: A Seriously Heated Race! Into The Final Round!
episodes.overview: Thanks to to some quick planning, the Straw Hats win the race.

episodes.name: Screaming-Hot Bombardment! Pirate Dodgeball!
episodes.overview: With Luffy's victory, he takes Chopper back, but foolishly accepts another challenge by Foxy.

episodes.name: Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!
episodes.overview: Foxy decides to take Robin from Luffy this time because of her Devil Fruit ability. The next match is a race to the top of the island.

episodes.name: The Captains Square Off! The Final Combat Round!
episodes.overview: With Chopper gone again from Luffy's crew, Luffy and Foxy face off in the final game: a battle of brawn aboard Foxy's ship.

episodes.name: Full-Blast Slow-Slow Onslaught Vs. Invulnerable Luffy!
episodes.overview: Luffy continues to battle Foxy with the odds not in his favor, and the fight continues inside Foxy's ship.

episodes.name: Epic, Heated Combat! The Fateful Final Conclusion!
episodes.overview: Luffy manages to finally defeat Foxy by using his ability against him. After dismissing his new crewmembers, the Straw Hats leave in search for a shipwright.

episodes.name: Was It Lost? Stolen? Who Are You?
episodes.overview: A mysterious figure appears during the night and steals the memories of the crew. In the morning, Robin is the only one who remembers the Straw Hats adventures together. Her attempts to keep the crew together fail as Nami and Zoro go separate ways.

episodes.name: A Mysterious Boy with a Horn and Robin's Deduction!
episodes.overview: Robin suggests that only those who were sleeping lost their memories. Luffy and the others then remember seeing the mysterious boy who played some kind of flute. Later that night, they discover the boy outside and Luffy tries to fight him. At the last second, he proclaims his memory has returned.

episodes.name: Now, Let's Get Back Our Memories! The Pirate Crew Lands on the Island!
episodes.overview: During the night, Usopp, Chopper, and Sanji question what brought them to the Going Merry. In the morning, Usopp builds them a raft and they sail to the island where they meet Nami again. Meanwhile, the boy sets his sights on Zoro.

episodes.name: Zoro Bares His Fangs! A Savage Animal Stands in the Way!
episodes.overview: On their way to "The Palace of the Sea God" Robin's group meets an entranced Zoro. It looks like Zoro wants to fight so Luffy urges the others to keep going without him. They apprehend the kid but the whistle was what was really stealing their memories. Zoro returns, still entranced, but Luffy's nowhere to be seen.

episodes.name: The Last Counterattack by the Memory Thief Who Reveals His True Colors!
episodes.overview: Luffy returns and knocks some sense into Zoro. Cornered, the sea horse spreads illusions of the people in their memories to distract them. It steals their complete memories and claims that it has become a Sennenryu. Luffy defeats it and returns all the memories but the townspeople are convinced they are the memory stealers.

episodes.name: Proud Man! Silver Fox Foxy!
episodes.overview: Luffy rescues Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche from a storm at sea. When they reunite with the Sexy Foxy ship, they find it captained by somebody new. Foxy accepts a Davy Back Fight in order to regain his ship and crew. Donning the afro once again, Luffy vows to defeat the captain.

episodes.name: The Guy Who's The Closest To Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!
episodes.overview: Once Foxy wins back his crew, he captures the Straw Hats. Nami and Luffy fight Foxy and although he's defeated, his crew accepts him back. Later, they sail to an island where they meet someone Robin knows: a Marine named Aokiji.

episodes.name: Marine Headquarters Admiral Aokiji! The Ferocity of an Ultimate Powerhouse!
episodes.overview: The man they met, Marine High Admiral Aokiji, appears to be incredibly lazy. He first displays his Devil's Fruit ability by freezing the sea so some deserted people can get off the island. Unfortunately, he's determined to catch Robin. Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro attack but they seem to be no match.

episodes.name: Duel Between Rubber and Ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!
episodes.overview: Robin is frozen by Aokiji and Luffy tells the others to escape with her. In the Going Merry, Usopp and Chopper try to thaw her in the shower. Luffy gets defeated (frozen), but his life is spared as Aokiji believes he must repay the debt the marines incurred from Crocodile's defeat at Luffy's hands. With the crew defrosted, they continue sailing as usual. Zoro spots the giant frog they heard about and they chase it to an island with a lighthouse, but it appears they'll sink before they get there.

7.name: Long Ring Long Land
7.overview:
The Straw Hats accidentally float down into the Marine base, G-8. Forced to abandon ship, the crew must make their way through the base to reclaim the Going Merry and avoid capture.

The crew manage to safely reach their next island, Long Ring Long Land. They meet a nomad who's been stuck on the island for a while and offer to help him. But before they can, they're challenged by a pirate who calls himself Foxy the Silver Fox in a game of "Davy Back Fight", where the losers can lose their crew members.

One night as the crew rest, a boy with a seahorse-shaped flute plays it near the ship. The next day the crew awaken with their memories of each other wiped out, except for Robin. It's up to her, who was the only one not affected, to get the crew's memories back and find out the cause of it.

The Straw Hat pirates later re-encounter Foxy, Porche, and Hamburg. This encounter leads to a fight, and also leads to the encounter with Aokiji.

episodes.name: The Dashing Sea Train and the City of Water: Water Seven!
episodes.overview: After the Going Merry narrowly escapes being hit by a "sea train", the crew meets an old woman, Kokoro, and her granddaughter, Chimney. Kokoro gives Luffy a map to Water Seven. Luffy, Nami, and Usopp buy boats driven by sea monsters called "yagara".

episodes.name: Adventure in the City On the Water! Head to the Mammoth Shipbuilding Plant!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp get strange greetings from the residents and they get to experience the roller coaster-like channels of Water Seven. Luffy find out that some pirates had been beaten at the hands of some powerful craftsmen; the Galley La Company. Chopper loses Robin and some strange new people threaten Zoro back on the ship.

episodes.name: The Franky Family and Iceberg!
episodes.overview: The people who attacked Zoro reveal themselves to be the feared "Franky Family", though they're no match for Zoro. Luffy have their gold exchanged for cash. After, they meet a man who resembles Usopp, Galley La's carpenter employment foreman, Kaku. Usopp's cut of the money is stolen by the Franky Family.

episodes.name: Galley-La Company! A Grand Sight: Dock #1!
episodes.overview: Paulie makes his debut when he retrieves Usopp's stolen money as he runs from debt collectors. Kalifa shows Luffy, Nami, and Usopp around Dock No. 1 and tells them how Iceburg founded the Galley La Company. Kaku returns from the Going Merry and tells them that their keel is irreparably damaged.

episodes.name: Pirate Abduction Incident! A Pirate Ship That Can Only Await Her End!
episodes.overview: Luffy refuses to believe that Galley La cannot repair the Going Merry. The two soon realize that not only is Usopp missing now, but the two brief cases that were returned to them are empty. Nami decides to head to Franky House and finds Usopp on the way in a pitiful state. As she heads back to the ship for help, Usopp goes to the Franky House himself.

episodes.name: Rescuing Our Friend! Raid on the Franky House!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Sanji, Zoro, and Chopper follow Usopp's bloody trail to the Franky House, where they find him passed out in front. The four of them challenge the Franky Family only to find out that their real target, Franky himself, is gone and has taken the money with him.

episodes.name: Big Fight under the Moon! The Pirate Flag Flutters with Sorrow!
episodes.overview: Once they're back on the ship, Luffy has to finally tell Usopp that the Going Merry can no longer be repaired and that they've chosen to get a new ship without him. Usopp believes that Luffy has abandoned the dignity of their ship and says he's leaving the crew. That night, he challenges Luffy to a duel.

episodes.name: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of Two Men's Pride!
episodes.overview: Usopp fights Luffy in order to decide who keeps the Going Merry; he fights harder than he's ever fought before. Luffy actually seems to pose no threat but all the while, he's remembering what great friends they used to be, sailing together on the same ship. Even after taking a harsh beating, Luffy defeats Usopp. They leave Usopp and the ship behind.

episodes.name: Severe Shock Hits the City of Water! Iceberg Targeted!
episodes.overview: The Strawhats get themselves a hotel room. Nami finds the crew on the roof with urgent news: Iceburg has been shot.
