episodes.overview: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in a boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard’s onslaught!

episodes.name: Mighty Magellan! Bon Clay Bugs Out
episodes.overview: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?

episodes.name: The Showdown Has Come! Luffy's Desperate Last Attack!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into second gear!

episodes.name: For His Friend! Bon Clay Goes to the Deadly Rescue!
episodes.overview: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!

episodes.name: A Paradise in Hell! Impel Down Level 5.5!
episodes.overview: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!

episodes.name: Luffy's Treatment Begins! Ivan-san's Miraculous Power!
episodes.overview: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan’s agonizingly painful “Healing Hormones” will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!

episodes.name: Believe in Miracles! Bon Clay's Cries from the Heart
episodes.overview: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy’s still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!

episodes.name: Luffy's Back! Ivan-san Begins the Breakout Plan!
episodes.overview: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he’s far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy’s lineage!

episodes.name: Ace's Convoy Begins! Battle on the Lowest Floor, Level 6!
episodes.overview: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan’s scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!

episodes.name: The Ultimate Team Has Formed! Shaking Impel Down!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.

episodes.name: Even More Chaos! Here Comes Blackbeard Teech!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard’s arrival leads to the release of the prison’s most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!

episodes.name: The Dangerous Encounter! Blackbeard and Shiryu of the Rain!
episodes.overview: Three battles are raging throughout Impel Down - Luffy tackles the demon guards, Ivankov squares off against Sadie-chan, and Shiryu reaches the gate of Impel Down to meet Blackbeard and his crew. But are things really as they seem? Meanwhile, Buggy's bright ideas are close to freeing him and Mr. 3 from Impel Down.

episodes.name: No Price Too High! Serious Hannyabal!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say – heads will roll!

episodes.name: Jet Pistol of Anger! Luffy vs. Blackbeard!
episodes.overview: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard’s vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!

episodes.name: Stop Magellan! Ivan-san's Esoteric Technique Explodes
episodes.overview: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan’s toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy’s neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden’s Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!

episodes.name: Magellan's Tricky Move! A Foiled Escape Plan!
episodes.overview: Buggy and the others can taste freedom on just the other side of the door to Impel Down, but their escape is thwarted by Magellan's secret plan. Meanwhile, Luffy has a chance to face Magellan again - and avenge the Ivankov and Inazuma.

episodes.name: The Escapee Team in Trouble! The Forbidden Move: Venom Demon!
episodes.overview: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don’t return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won’t survive long enough to save Ace!

episodes.name: Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they’re not out hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!

episodes.name: To the Navy Headquarters! Off to Rescue Ace!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy’s reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.

episodes.name: The Friends' Whereabouts! The Weatheria Report and the Cyborg Animals!
episodes.overview: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!

episodes.name: The Friends' Whereabouts! A Cheeper of Giant Birds and a Pink Showdown!
episodes.overview: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!

episodes.name: The Friends' Whereabouts! Revolutionaries and the Gorging Forest's Trap!
episodes.overview: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!

episodes.name: The Friends' Whereabouts! A Huge Tomb and the Panty Debt!
episodes.overview: Zoro’s attempt to reunite with his friends leads him a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!

episodes.name: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Vow of the Brotherhood!
episodes.overview: While the marines prepare for Ace’s execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!

episodes.name: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Three Navy Admirals Come Together!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!

episodes.name: Ticking Down to the Time of Battle! The Navy's Strongest Lineup in Position!
episodes.overview: Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man’s father is shockingly revealed!

episodes.name: A Vast Fleet Appears! Here Come the Whitebeard Pirates!
episodes.overview: Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace’s mother in order save his life – and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes an unexpected entrance!

episodes.name: The Beginning of the War! Ace and Whitebeard's Past!
episodes.overview: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard – and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!

episodes.name: The Force That Could Destroy the World! The Power of the Tremor-Tremor Fruit!
episodes.overview: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?

episodes.name: An All-Consuming Inferno!! Admiral Akainu's Power!
episodes.overview: Fire meets ice as mythical warriors, erupting admirals, legendary pirates, and a giant giant go head to head in the biggest, baddest battle of all time! There’s only one thing missing: Monkey D. Luffy!

episodes.name: A Descendent of the Beast! Little Oars Jr. - Full Speed Ahead!
episodes.overview: A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm’s reach of his friend when he’s intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea!

episodes.name: Justice for the Winners! Sengoku's Strategy in Action!
episodes.overview: In the wake of Little Oars Junior’s tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace’s execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!

episodes.name: Straw Hat Team Arrives! Tension Grows at the Battlefield
episodes.overview: Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man’s refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!

episodes.name: Even If It Means Death! Luffy vs. the Navy; The Battle Starts!
episodes.overview: Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother!

episodes.name: Hard Battles, One After Another! Devil Fruit Eaters vs. Devil Fruit Eaters!
episodes.overview: Supernatural powers take center stage in the battle to save Ace as Luffy and his uniquely talented allies throw down with the Navy’s own arsenal of Devil Fruit Eaters!

episodes.name: Kuma's Transformation! Ivan-san's Blow of Anger!
episodes.overview: A gift from Boa Hancock and Ivan-san’s Galaxy Wink get Luffy closer to Ace than ever, but a sword-wielding foe from the past threatens to derail the rescue mission!

episodes.name: The Great Swordsman Mihawk! Luffy Comes Under the Attack of the Black Sword!
episodes.overview: Luffy runs into a lethal roadblock in the form of Hawk-Eye Mihawk. The legendary swordsman is determined to halt Luffy’s onslaught, but Ivan-san, Boa Hancock, and Jimbei aren’t ready to give up the fight!

episodes.name: The Extermination Strategy in Action! The Power of the Pacifistas!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!

episodes.name: Akainu's Plot! Whitebeard Entrapped!
episodes.overview: Whitebeard is betrayed – and brutally stabbed – by one of his own men! In the wake of this unthinkable act of treason, allegations about the legendary pirate bring the battle to a halt!

episodes.name: The Encircling Walls Activated! The Whitebeard Pirates backed into a corner!
episodes.overview: Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy’s defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!

episodes.name: Execution Order Issued! Break Through the Encircling Walls!
episodes.overview: With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!

episodes.name: Moving into the Final Phase! Whitebeard's Trump Card for Recovery!
episodes.overview: Crocodile’s unexpected assistance creates and opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!

episodes.name: Luffy at the End of His Tether! An All-out Battle at the Oris Plaza!
episodes.overview: The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!

episodes.name: The Power That Will Shorten One's Life! Energy Hormone, Redux!
episodes.overview: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a trouble youth spent seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!

episodes.name: To Live Up to a Promise! Luffy and Coby Collide!
episodes.overview: Luffy makes short work of face from his past, and Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner’s swords hovering above Ace’s head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!

episodes.name: The Scaffold at Last! The Way to Ace Has Opened!
episodes.overview: Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises up to derail the rescue mission at the last second!

episodes.name: Each on Different Paths! Luffy vs. Garp!
episodes.overview: Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight – his own grandfather – in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won’t be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide back up!

episodes.name: Ace Rescued! Whitebeard's Final Order!
episodes.overview: Ace is finally free from the execution scaffold! Luffy and his brother make a fearsome team as they blaze a path toward salvation. Ravaged by the war, Whitebeard wistfully commands his men to make the journey to the New World without him!

episodes.name: The Power That Can Burn Even Fire! Akainu's Ruthless Pursuit!
episodes.overview: Despite Whitebeard’s order to retreat, Ace is drawn back to the battlefield by the cruel taunts of a Marine adversary. Luffy watches in horror as his brother makes what could be his last stand!

episodes.name: Looking for the Answer! Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield!
episodes.overview: n eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together. With his dying breath, Ace begs his brother to convey a message to his fellow pirates.

episodes.name: The Navy Headquarters Falls! Whitebeard's Unspeakable Wrath!
episodes.overview: Anguished cries echo across the battlefield in the wake of Ace’s tragic death. Luffy – paralyzed by grief – must be carried to safety, but Whitebeard summons the strength for one last ferocious attack!

episodes.name: Ending the Matter! Whitebeard vs. The Blackbeard Pirates!
episodes.overview: Whitebeard’s children watch in horror as the old man faces off against the villainous Blackbeard pirates. Though his injuries are mounting and the odds are stacked against him, Whitebeard never, ever runs away from a fight!

episodes.name: The Show Begins! Blackbeard's Plot is Revealed!
episodes.overview: The world reacts to Whitebeard’s death with shock and awe. Meanwhile, Jimbei risks his life to save Luffy and Blackbeard reveals the depraved depths of his nefarious nature!

episodes.name: Akainu's Tenacity! The Fist of Magma Attacks Luffy
episodes.overview: While Blackbeard and his men seek to sink Marineford, Jimbei and Luffy’s desperate attempt to flee is thwarted by Akainu’s fiery fists. The situation appears dire until a former enemy lends a sandy hand!

episodes.name: The Desperate Scream! Courageous Moments that Will Change the Future
episodes.overview: Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates offer Luffy a submarine escape route, Blackbeard continues his reckless rampage, and a puny pink-hair marine changes the world with a scream!

episodes.name: Here Comes Shanks! The War of the Best is Finally Over!
episodes.overview: The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!

episodes.name: Mighty Leaders Face Each Other Down! Heralding the 'New Era'!
episodes.overview: The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard’s death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy’s friends fear that Ace’s death may be more than the rubber-man can handle – if he ever wakes up!

episodes.name: Landing at the Maiden Island! The Harsh Reality Falls upon Luffy!
episodes.overview: Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard, and Luffy’s nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!

episodes.name: The Strongest Tag-Team! Luffy and Toriko's Hard Struggle!
episodes.overview: After eating the Hungrila Bird that they captured, Luffy and Toriko team up again to save Nami and Komatsu who have been kidnapped by the Cocoalas.

episodes.name: Luffy and Ace! The Story of How the Brothers Met!
episodes.overview: A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!

episodes.name: Here Comes Sabo! The Boy at the Gray Terminal!
episodes.overview: The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death – or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him!

episodes.name: I Won't Run! Ace's Desperate Rescue Operation!
episodes.overview: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight – even when he’s outnumbered!

episodes.name: To The Sea Someday! The Pledge of the Three Brats!
episodes.overview: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend’s past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates, and hoist a toast to brotherhood!

episodes.name: Leaving the Dadan Family for Good?! The Kids' Hideout Has Been Built!
episodes.overview: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!

episodes.name: Luffy Becoming an Apprentice?! A Man Who Fought Against the King of the Pirates!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that’s been stealing their food, Ace gets angry when his father’s identity is revealed, and Sabo’s parents hire pirates to track down their son!

episodes.name: The Battle against the Big Tiger! Who is Going to be Captain?!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeating the big tiger – and becoming a good captain!

episodes.name: Freedom Taken Away! The Nobles' Plot Closing in on the Brothers!
episodes.overview: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!

episodes.name: The Fire Has Been Set! The Gray Terminal in Crisis!
episodes.overview: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!

episodes.name: Where can freedom be found? A Sad Departure of a Boy!
episodes.overview: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last ditch escape attempt!

episodes.name: Take Good Care of Him! A Letter from the Brother!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo’s ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and extract revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!

episodes.name: To Live Up to the Promise! Departures of Their Own!
episodes.overview: Through all the trials and tribulations of their life in the Goa Kingdom; East Blue, the brother Ace and Luffy are finally set to go out on their own. Have they gained the strength they need? With the ghost of Sabo looking on, the two begin the next chapter in their life!

episodes.name: I Want to See Them! Luffy's Mournful Cry!
episodes.overview: After the War of the Best, Garp finds that he has to answer to Dadan for not having been able to stop Ace’s death, while Luffy, who has lost his will to fight on, is reminded by a close ally that he still has something worth fighting for!!

episodes.name: Straw Hats in Shock! The Bad News Has Reached Them!
episodes.overview: Luffy finally realizes that, though he has lost his brother, Ace, he still has a lot to live for! Meanwhile, other members of the Straw Hat crew begin to hear news of the tragic events of the War of the Best -- and their thoughts turn immediately to Luffy!

episodes.name: Reunited with Dark King Rayleigh! Decision Time for Luffy!
episodes.overview: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!

episodes.name: Back to Our Captain! A Jail Break at the Sky Island and the Incident on the Winter Island!
episodes.overview: Nami tries to escape the Sky Island - Weatheria in order to be reunited with Luffy, but it proves more difficult than she planned. Meanwhile Franky tries to escape Winter Island, but there is only one boat to take…

episodes.name: Encounter! The Great Swordsman Mihawk! Zoro's Self-Willed Deadly Struggle!
episodes.overview: Zoro’s escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies, and Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms!

episodes.name: A Disaster for Sanji! The Queen's Return to the Kingdom!
episodes.overview: Chopper hitches a ride on a giant bird, Luffy makes a shocking return to Marineford, and Sanji finds himself fighting the most beautiful man he’s ever seen!

episodes.name: Unexpected Relanding! Luffy, to Marineford!
episodes.overview: Luffy, along with Jimbei and Dark King Rayleigh, causes quite the commotion upon his return to Marineford. Meanwhile, powerful pirates all across the globe wreak havoc on the innocent!

episodes.name: With Hopes It Will Reach My Friends! Big News Spreading Fast!
episodes.overview: Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat’s ship from scandalous scavengers!

episodes.name: Pirates Get on the Move! Astounding New World!
episodes.overview: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!

episodes.name: Living through Hell! Sanji's Fight for His Manhood!
episodes.overview: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather, Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk’s laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress!

episodes.name: I Will Get Much, Much Stronger! Zoro's Pledge to His Captain!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon, Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!

episodes.name: Luffy's Training Begins! To the Place We Promised in 2 Years!
episodes.overview: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he’ll have to hone his hidden powers!

episodes.name: The Beginning of The New Chapter! The Straw Hats Reunited!
episodes.overview: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!

episodes.name: An Explosive Situation! Luffy vs. Fake Luffy!
episodes.overview: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zoro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!

episodes.name: The Navy Has Set Out! The Straw Hats in Danger!
episodes.overview: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his “friends” have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?

episodes.name: Big Guns Assembled! The Danger of the Fake Straw Hats!
episodes.overview: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky’s new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!

episodes.name: The Battle is on! Show Them What You Got From Training!
episodes.overview: Things get pretty hectic as the Navy finally confronts Fake Luffy's amassed pirate army - and the real Straw Hats prepare to set sail! Things don't go smoothly for either, however, and the real Luffy gets to show off what he has learned in the past two years!

episodes.name: Everyone Together! Luffy, Setting Out for the New World!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they’ll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they’ve made in the last two years!

13.name: Impel Down & Marineford
13.overview:
Luffy puts finding his crew on hold in favor of rescuing his brother Ace from the underwater prison Impel Down. With Boa Hancock's help, he manages to infiltrate the facility. However, fulfilling his objective and escaping the hellish prison might be easier said than done.

Having failed to reach Ace before he was transferred, Luffy and his companions escape from Impel Down and travel to Marineford, the base of Marine Headquarters. With the odds stacked high against him, the imminent threat of Whitebeard, and the ulterior motives of pirates that wish to overthrow the Emperor, Luffy struggles to hold his own in this titanic clash of powers.

episodes.name: A Suprising Fact! The Man Who Guarded the Sunny!
episodes.overview: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!

episodes.name: Deadly Combat under the Sea! The Demon of the Ocean Strikes!
episodes.overview: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hats. While Caribou manages to get on the Thousand Sunny, the rest of his crew gets pulled away by Mohmoo, who gets frightened when he recognizes the Straw Hats from his time in Arlong Park. Caribou is left alone and, as a result, is captured by the Straw Hats. The Straw Hats come across the Kraken, which destroys the ship of the Caribou Pirates, who returned to save their captain, and then attacks Thousand Sunny. The Straw Hats manage to avoid its attacks and Luffy, along with Zoro and Sanji, are getting ready to fight it.

episodes.name: Lost in the Deep Sea! The Straw Hats Get Separated!
episodes.overview: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!

episodes.name: Undersea Volcanic Eruption! Drifting to the Fish-Man Island!
episodes.overview: The Flying Dutchman shows up and Vander Decken tells Wadatsumi to crush the Thousand Sunny, but then the Kraken beats Wadatsumi. The volcano erupts, and the pirates run from it. Surume jumps off a cliff and some big stones are about to crush them but Usopp stops them for a while with his new move, called Sargasso. But, when they are celebrating their survival, a rock hit Surume's head, made it faints as they are descending to the depth of the cliff. At the bottom of the cliff, they find Fishman Island but when they are about to enter, they are stopped by a group of sea monsters and someone riding it.

episodes.name: Landing at the Fish-Man Island! Beautiful Mermaids!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates encounter Hammond, some sea-beasts and other fishmen from the New Fishman Pirates. Franky launches the Coup de Burst towards Fishman Island to escape the pirates. Unfortunately the Straw Hats get separated from the Sunny and from each other. Luffy wakes up after a while only to reunite with Keimi, Usopp, Sanji and Chopper. They leave Keimi's house and go to a higher level of the island where they meet other mermaids. Meanwhile, Hammond informs their leader about the Straw Hats entering Fishman Island.

episodes.name: Excitement Blow-out! Sanji's Life Under Threat!
episodes.overview: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!

episodes.name: The Fish-Man Island Will Be Annihilated?! Sharley's Prophecy!
episodes.overview: As blood donors are finally found, the recovering Sanji stays at the Mermaid Cafe while Luffy, Usopp and Keimi meet Pappug and Brook. The five of them head for Pappug's home. In the meantime, Ishilly and her friends vanish after opening the barrel that was washed up together with the Straw Hats and the episode ends with Madam Sharley predicting that Luffy would destroy Fishman Island.

episodes.name: The King of the Fish-Man Island! Neptune, the God of the Sea!
episodes.overview:
The episode starts with Gyro escaping from Hody Jones who in turn goes after him. The Straw Hat Pirates are in a town on Fishman Island and King Neptune and Megalo appear to invite the Straw Hats to Ryugu Palace.

Hody destroys Gyro's ship with handcuffs on to show how powerful he is. He defeated them all but left them still conscious so that they can tell about what is happening under sea to the people on earth.

episodes.name: Ryugu Palace! Taken by the Shark that They Saved!
episodes.overview: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!

episodes.name: A Coward and a Crybaby! The Princess in the Hard Shell Tower!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune’s army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance!

episodes.name: It's An Emergency! The Ryugu Palace Is Occupied!
episodes.overview: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!

episodes.name: It's The Ryugu Palace in Shock! The Kidnapping Of Shirahoshi!
episodes.overview: Luffy accidentally “kidnaps” the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace!

episodes.name: Hordy's Onslaught! The Retaliatory Plan Set Into Motion!
episodes.overview: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.

episodes.name: The Ryugu Palace fight! Zoro vs Hordy!
episodes.overview: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk!

episodes.name: Keep Shirahoshi Safe! Decken Close Behind!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!

episodes.name: The Straw Hats Defeated!? Hordy Gains Control of the Ryugu Palace!
episodes.overview: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they’re no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.

episodes.name: The Haunting Ties! Nami And The Fish-Man Pirates! The Resurrected Destiny! Nami and the Fishman Pirate Crew!
episodes.overview: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.

episodes.name: A Hero Who Freed The Slaves! An Adventurer Tiger!
episodes.overview: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime’s fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.

episodes.name: Kizaru Appears! A Trap To Catch Tiger!
episodes.overview: Arlong’s violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.

episodes.name: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper
episodes.overview: Toriko and Luffy continue their search for the ingredients to save Chopper on To-Chuka Island.

episodes.name: The Death of the Hero! A Shocking Truth of Tiger!
episodes.overview: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.

episodes.name: The Sun Pirates Split! Jimbei vs. Arlong!
episodes.overview: After the death of Fisher Tiger, Arlong's abuse of humans lands him in jail, Jimbei becomes the captain of the Sun Pirates, and Queen Otohime's passion to see her vision come true is renewed!

episodes.name: Shaking Fish-Man Island! A Celestial Dragon Drifts In!
episodes.overview: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!

episodes.name: A Sudden Tragedy! A Gunshot Shuts Down the Future!
episodes.overview: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen’s mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.

episodes.name: Back to the Present! Hordy Makes a Move!
episodes.overview: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!

episodes.name: The Kingdom in Shock! An Order to Execute Neptune Issued!
episodes.overview: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!

episodes.name: A Rift Opens Up! Luffy vs. Jimbei!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy’s uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out of body experience with hopes of saving his mates!

episodes.name: Something Has Happened to Hordy! The True Power of the Evil Drug!
episodes.overview: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!

episodes.name: The Battle is on! At Conchcorde Plaza!
episodes.overview: Hordy’s rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy’s onslaught!

episodes.name: Surprising Confession! The Truth Behind the Assassination of Otohime!
episodes.overview: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!

episodes.name: Shirahoshi's Tears! Luffy Finally Shows Up!
episodes.overview: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother’s murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!

episodes.name: A Great Clash! The Straw Hat Crew vs. 100,000 Enemies
episodes.overview: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!

episodes.name: Deadly Attacks One After Another! Zoro and Sanji Join The Battle!
episodes.overview: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they’ve become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats?

episodes.name: Unveiled! The Secret Weapons of the Sunny!
episodes.overview: Hordy’s men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!

episodes.name: Iron Pirates! General Franky Appears
episodes.overview: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man’s face!

episodes.name: Noah Approaches! The Crisis of Fishman Island's Destruction!
episodes.overview: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that’s heading straight for Fish-Man Island!

episodes.name: Hurry Up, Luffy! Shirahoshi's Desperate Situation
episodes.overview: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy’s devious nature fully comes to the surface.

episodes.name: The Battle Begins! Luffy Vs. Hordy!
episodes.overview: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami’s honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!

episodes.name: A Massive Confused Fight! The Straw Hats vs. The New Fish-Man Pirates!
episodes.overview: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!

episodes.name: Luffy Loses the Fight?! Hordy's Long Awaited Revenge!
episodes.overview: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he’ll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi’s big brother risks his own life in heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!

episodes.name: A Shocking Fact! The True Identity of Hordy!
episodes.overview: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy’s hatred for humans is finally revealed!

episodes.name: Back to Zero! Ernest Wishes for Luffy!
episodes.overview: Hordy’s twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi’s brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!

episodes.name: Luffy's All-out Attack! Red Hawk Blasts!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!

episodes.name: Coming to an End! The Final Decisive Battle Against Hordy
episodes.overview: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat…

episodes.name: Stop, Noah! Desperate Elephant Gantling!
episodes.overview: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!

episodes.name: To the Future! The Path to the Sun!
episodes.overview: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!

episodes.name: The Secret Revealed! The Truth About the Ancient Weapon!
episodes.overview: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!

episodes.name: The Straw Hats Stunned! The New Fleet Admiral of the Navy!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy’s gang finally gets what’s coming to them!

episodes.name: She Loves Sweets! Big Mom of the Four Emperors!
episodes.overview: When Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji stumble upon a couple of Big Mom’s henchmen extorting sweets from the peaceful people of Fish-Man Island, the Straw Hats make a new – and very powerful – enemy!

episodes.name: Many Problems Lie Ahead! A Trap Awaiting in the New World!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!

episodes.name: Finally Time to Go! Goodbye, Fish-Man Island!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!

episodes.name: To the New World! Heading for the Ultimate Sea!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Usopp’s extreme deep sea fishing adventure lands the crew in the middle of a deadly whirlpool, but an unexpected encounter with a pod of giant whales may bail the Straw Hats out of hot water!

episodes.name: Z's Ambition! Lily the Little Giant!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s arrival in the New World is marked by violent weather and the discovery of a tiny stowaway. When the Straw Hats agree to help their new friend, it could lead to big trouble with the Marines!

episodes.name: Z's Ambition! A Dark and Powerful Army!
episodes.overview: Nami hatches a plan to save Lily’s father, but the arrival of an ex-marine madman throws a monkey wrench into the rescue mission.

episodes.name: Z's Ambition! A Great and Desperate Escape Plan!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Zoro find themselves locked in battle with their latest foes, but Nami’s knowledge of the sea may be the key to escaping this scrum alive!

episodes.name: Z's Ambition! Luffy vs. Shuzo!
episodes.overview: Shuzo and his clan are in hot pursuit of the Straw Hats after using a Vivre Card to track them. Shuzo puts up a good fight displaying strong Haki, but Luffy and Lily are able to combine attacks in a surprising way to level the playing field!

episodes.name: Arriving! A Burning Island - Punk Hazard!
episodes.overview: A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast that could make short work of Luffy and the gang!

episodes.name: A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. The Giant Dragon!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Robin, Usopp, and Zoro face down a powerful dragon as the battle heats up on Punk Hazard! And Luffy finds himself on the dragon's back during the attack, a mysterious discovery adds to the mystery of the island! Meanwhile, danger closes in for the rest of the Straw Hats on the Sunny...

14.name: Fishman Island
14.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates finally arrive at Fishman Island. There, the crew learn the history of Fisher Tiger and the ongoing discrimination between humans and fishman, while the New Fishman Pirates plot to overtake Ryugu Kingdom and make fishman be recognized as the supreme race.

episodes.name: The Straw Hats Stunned! Enter: A Samurai's Horrifying Severed Head!
episodes.overview: Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less Samurai! Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!

episodes.name: Startling! The Secret of the Island Is Finally Revealed
episodes.overview: Luffy makes friends with a Centaur, Franky uses a cola-powered laser to break out of the clink, and Sanji takes a chance on a body-less Samurai!

episodes.name: Save the Children! The Straw Hats Start to Fight!
episodes.overview: Nami’s soft spot for children prompts her to call off the escape and declare war on anyone who makes a kid cry. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang take a banana boat to the icy side of the island!

episodes.name: A Swordplay Showdown! Brook Vs. The Mysterious Torso Samurai!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles the torso of a surly samurai, and Captain Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected!

episodes.name: The Warlord! Trafalgar Law
episodes.overview: Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for the children, Luffy’s group hopes to avoid a perilous plunge into icy waters, and Captain Smoker faces off against Trafalgar Law!

episodes.name: In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks into the Ice-cold Lake!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami’s group and cast our heroes into chaotic confusion!

episodes.name: A Collision! Law vs. Vice Admiral Smoker!
episodes.overview: Nami and the others are subject to Law's bizarre powers, but have to put the shocking results behind them as they make a break out of the facility. Meanwhile, the battle heats up between Law and the G-5; and the mystery of Punk Hazard deepens!

episodes.name: Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law!
episodes.overview: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law, but a reunion with his mixed up crew – and the loss of his extra legs – quickly dampens the captain’s enthusiasm!

episodes.name: The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!
episodes.overview: While Captain Smoker determines his next move, a very large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard’s mysterious transformation!

episodes.name: History's Strongest Collaboration vs. Glutton of the Sea (II)
episodes.overview: The crossover starts on Toriko E99 Run, Strongest Team! Toriko, Luffy, and Goku! (I)

episodes.name: Chopper's Fury! The Master's Inhumane Experiment!
episodes.overview: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo!

episodes.name: To Annihilate the Straw Hats! Legendary Assassins Descend!
episodes.overview: The story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed, and the Yeti Cool Brothers set their sights on a showdown with the Straw Hats!

episodes.name: Save Nami! Luffy's Fight on the Snow-Capped Mountains!
episodes.overview: Luffy tries to chase down the Yetti Cool Brothers, but Franky – still trapped in Chopper’s Body – makes his mission extremely difficult. Just when all appears lost, an unexpected ally lends a hand!

episodes.name: Formed! Luffy and Law's Pirate Alliance!
episodes.overview: Luffy agrees to an alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master unleashes something very deadly!

episodes.name: Capture M! The Pirate Alliance's Operation Launches!
episodes.overview: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, Trafalgar tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory, and Luffy boldly challenges the Master!

episodes.name: On the Verge of Annihilation! A Deadly Monster Comes Flying In!
episodes.overview: Luffy’s battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob – and the evil genius who created the monster!

episodes.name: An Intense Battle! Caesar Exercises His True Power!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats make a valiant push to capture Caesar Clown - Luffy matches his Armament Haki with Clown's powerful Gas-Gas Fruit powers! The battle turns in favor of the Straw Hats, but underestimating Clown's abilities may have deadly consequences! Meanwhile, Law's plan to infiltrate Clown's facility hits a snag when an unseen guest complicates things!

episodes.name: The Samurai that Cuts the Fire! Kin'emon of Foxfire!
episodes.overview: Trafalgar Law finds trouble in the form of an old acquaintance, Chopper investigates the Master’s lab, and the mysterious Samurai shows what he can do with a full body!

episodes.name: Shocking! The True Identity of the Mystery Man Vergo!
episodes.overview: The Master gathers his young test subjects, shocking secret identities are finally revealed, and the poisonous purple blob continues its march across the island!

episodes.name: Save the Children! The Master's Evil Hands Close in!
episodes.overview: Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children, Chopper plots a daring escape attempt, and the Master markets his greatest weapon!

episodes.name: Shaking Up the New World! Caesar's Horrendous Experiment!
episodes.overview: A desperate need for candy leads the children to return to the lab, and Caesar plans to show the world the new and improved version of Smiley!

episodes.name: The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!
episodes.overview: Luffy and the Straw Hats find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of purple gas that turns everything living thing in its path into petrified statues of ash!

episodes.name: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Law's Great Escape!
episodes.overview: Law’s got a trick up his sleeve that could mean the difference between life and death. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, but can they reach safety before being swallowed by a poisonous cloud?!

episodes.name: Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance!
episodes.overview: Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar – and save the children!

episodes.name: Tashigi's Tears! G-5's Desperate Breakthrough Plan!
episodes.overview: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi’s men make the ultimate sacrifice!

episodes.name: The Treacherous Vice Admiral! Demon Bamboo Vergo!
episodes.overview: Luffy races toward Caesar in the hopes of delivering a beating, Sanji saves a damsel in distress, and Chopper tries to prevent the children from eating the drugged candy!

episodes.name: A Fierce Battle Gets Heated! Luffy vs. Caesar!
episodes.overview: Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar’s reign of terror to a brutal end!

episodes.name: A Mastermind Underground! Doflamingo Makes His Move!
episodes.overview: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!

episodes.name: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!
episodes.overview: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!

episodes.name: Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!
episodes.overview: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar’s madness!

episodes.name: A Small Dragon! Momonosuke Appears!
episodes.overview: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!

episodes.name: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!
episodes.overview: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master’s candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!

episodes.name: Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro's Formidable One-Sword Style!
episodes.overview: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.

episodes.name: To Save Her Friends! Mocha Runs at the Risk of Her Life!
episodes.overview: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!

episodes.name: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!
episodes.overview: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!

episodes.name: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!
episodes.overview: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!

episodes.name: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!
episodes.overview: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!

episodes.name: Raid! An Assassin from Dressrosa!
episodes.overview: Word of Luffy and Law’s alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!

episodes.name: Running Wild! Invincible General Franky!
episodes.overview: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve, and a deadly secret kept deep in the island spells doom for everyone!

episodes.name: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!
episodes.overview: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar’s desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker’s plan to forever silence his enemies!

episodes.name: Capture Caesar! General Cannon Blast!
episodes.overview: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!

episodes.name: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!
episodes.overview: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!

episodes.name: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!
episodes.overview: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!

episodes.name: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!
episodes.overview: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo - a.k.a. the Joker - arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!

episodes.name: Intense! Aokiji vs. Doflamingo!
episodes.overview: Aokiji’s intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World -- where even a bit of hail portends doom!

episodes.name: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!
episodes.overview: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!

episodes.name: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!
episodes.overview: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water for the last time!

episodes.name: A Major Turnaround! Luffy's Angry Iron Fist Strikes!
episodes.overview: After Law discovers the secret to Breed’s power, Luffy and his old friend the Kung Fu Dugong give the animal-abusing madman a beasty beat down!

episodes.name: Startling! The Big News Shakes Up the New World!
episodes.overview: The world is in shock from Doflamingo's sudden resignation from the Seven Warlords. In the midst of all this, Law gives him information about the location and conditions for handing over Caesar, but hides his true intent - to destroy the SMILE manufactory. As the rendez-vous draws near, Doflamingo summons his executives and sets his own plan into motion!

episodes.name: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion: Dressrosa!
episodes.overview: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man whose luck has just run out...

episodes.name: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!
episodes.overview: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds, all eager to see the amazing prize Doflamingo has for his champion!

episodes.name: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl: Violet!
episodes.overview: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret! Meanwhile, the prize of a Devil Fruit derived from Ace's powers draws Luffy and Franky to the Colosseum, but if they want to win the prize, they'll have to face some of Dressrosa's most powerful villains!

episodes.name: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!
episodes.overview: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal - a free-for-all in which only the mightiest left standing will pass on to the next stage!

episodes.name: A Pirate Noble! Cavendish!
episodes.overview: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns; and we find out that the secret plot of the Straw Hats might not be the only covert action taking place in Dressrosa!

episodes.name: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!
episodes.overview: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is! Meanwhile, on the Sunny, the four who remained to watch the ship get a fright as they discover - they aren't alone!

episodes.name: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!
episodes.overview: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! Meanwhile, watching the battle for Block B from up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!

episodes.name: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!
episodes.overview: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages as mighty competitors - some favorites of the Colosseum, and other faceless unknowns rising through the ranks - continue to clamor for the chance to move on to the next round!

episodes.name: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!
episodes.overview: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though, as the king's powerful attack will take out all the competitors - or will it?

episodes.name: The Fishing Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!
episodes.overview: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed! As they gather their wits and plan to cross, they find out that something is living on the island - they're not alone!

episodes.name: Explore! Fairies' Island - Green Bit!
episodes.overview: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers! All this while Sanji learns the mysterious identity of Violet, and realizes he's in deeper trouble than he knew!

episodes.name: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!
episodes.overview: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe and find themselves mesmerized -- and Robin awakens to find herself pinned to ground!

episodes.name: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!
episodes.overview: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats’ plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?

15.name: Punk Hazard
15.overview: Upon finally entering the New World, the Straw Hat Pirates immediately receive a distress call from residents of Punk Hazard, who state that a samurai is attacking them. Without hesitation, Luffy sets out to the blazing island, with Vice Admiral Smoker hot on his tail. On the supposedly death-ridden and empty island, the Straw Hats soon must contend with both the G-5 Marines, led by Vice Admiral Smoker, and the mad scientist Caesar Clown, whose deadly experiments must be stopped.

episodes.name: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!
episodes.overview: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!

episodes.name: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!
episodes.overview: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback, and the Don Quixote Family's plans for dealing with Luffy are revealed!

episodes.name: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!
episodes.overview: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique and Don Chinjao sets his sights on Luffy!

episodes.name: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chinjao!
episodes.overview: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?

episodes.name: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!
episodes.overview: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa - the land of living toys!

episodes.name: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!
episodes.overview: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami and the others are cornered by Jora as the Transponder Snail starts to ring, and Luffy continues his fight to the death with Don Chinjao!

episodes.name: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chinjao!
episodes.overview: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?

episodes.name: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!
episodes.overview: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! Meanwhile, the agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed, and a voice from the past unsettles Luffy and sends him into a rage!

episodes.name: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!
episodes.overview: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!

episodes.name: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!
episodes.overview: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny, while also getting swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's assault on Dressrosa!

episodes.name: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!
episodes.overview: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and to their horror, prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies! Meanwhile, Zoro and Kin'emon stand outside the Colosseum searching for a way in, but an unknown, crying onlooker may hold the key!

episodes.name: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!
episodes.overview: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami and the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, and the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum -- with vicious contenders setting their sights on Rebecca!

episodes.name: The Great Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!
episodes.overview: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway with the full might of Joker and the Navy bearing down?

episodes.name: Rebeccca’s Sword of Death! Backwater Sword Dance!
episodes.overview: Law and Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown, which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation, Zoro finally gets to see Luffy -- but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca who is squaring off against some heavy hitters in the Colosseum.

episodes.name: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring - but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack or meet her certain doom!

episodes.name: A Big Surprise! A True Identity of the Toy Soldier!
episodes.overview: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear, as is the shocking identity of the toy soldier!

episodes.name: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!

episodes.name: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!
episodes.overview: As the toy soldier’s story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter, Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret as well...

episodes.name: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!
episodes.overview: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law -- as these two powerhouses clash, however, the weakness of Law's power has him against the ropes and may be his undoing.

episodes.name: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!
episodes.overview: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit -- and just when it seems like it couldn't get any worse, a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past ...and opens fire on the Sunny!

episodes.name: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!
episodes.overview: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier is now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family -- Operation SOP. Meanwhile, rushing to find the exit of the Colosseum, Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo – and another person who causes Luffy to lose his cool to a flood of emotions.

episodes.name: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!
episodes.overview: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House to find a way in there and hopeful cause a distraction to help his crewmates, but standing in his way is a pretty "hard boiled" guy!

episodes.name: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!
episodes.overview: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! As he fends off her signature finishing move, the Back-to-the-Water Dance, all hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!

episodes.name: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!
episodes.overview: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin’emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace only to find a mysterious woman was waiting for them - can she be trusted?

episodes.name: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!
episodes.overview: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy and the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. Meanwhile, in the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans for the Seven Warlords -- a plan so audacious even shocks Doflamingo!

episodes.name: The Final Round Starts! Diamante The Hero Shows Up!
episodes.overview: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! But as the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others and snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard? Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, Zoro, and Kin'emon have made it to the base of the Palace, but a sudden misstep may alert the Doflamingo Family to their presence!

episodes.name: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises up!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa personally, and the Tontatta Kingdom warriors along with Usopp and Robin get ready to make their first move!

episodes.name: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!
episodes.overview: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.

episodes.name: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!
episodes.overview: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered? Meanwhile, Zoro pits his expert swordsmanship against the indomitable Pica!

episodes.name: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!
episodes.overview: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol’s furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier’s stunning true identity! Meanwhile, with the help of another Tontatta group, the Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!

episodes.name: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!
episodes.overview: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!

episodes.name: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!
episodes.overview: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol? Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make - run and fight another day or face his own doom and challenge Trebol!

episodes.name: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!
episodes.overview: Usopp runs into trouble in his battle with Treebol, and flashback sheds light on how a young Kyros made the shocking transition from murderer to one of King Riku's most trusted men.

episodes.name: Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies!?
episodes.overview: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy, and all hopes rest on Usopp to provide the miracle everyone needs!

episodes.name: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-Out Attack!
episodes.overview: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!

episodes.name: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!
episodes.overview: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo’s clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring! Will he be able to snag the Flare-Flare Fruit?

episodes.name: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!
episodes.overview: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but the Young Master may have a trick left up his sleeve...

episodes.name: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!
episodes.overview: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!

episodes.name: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!
episodes.overview: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game - targeting Luffy, King Riku, and Law, but with the highest bounty reserved for Usopp!

episodes.name: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!
episodes.overview: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace along with Zoro and Law, Fujitora stands in his way!

episodes.name: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!
episodes.overview: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town and changes the stakes of the game!

episodes.name: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!
episodes.overview: With Luffy and the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out - to decide who gets to take down Doflamingo once and for all!

episodes.name: Steady Progress! Luffy's Army vs. Pica!
episodes.overview: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica’s giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action, summoning all the Navy soldiers on the island!

episodes.name: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him. Finally, Law's reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed!

episodes.name: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!
episodes.overview: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit! But with Fujitora's ability to call down a meteor, will Sabo have to power to save himself?
